-4679301568416347591.title: ServiceNow Consultant
-4679301568416347591.text:
ServiceNow Consultant
Place of work: Katowice, Krakow
About us
Capgemini is one of the world's foremost providers of consulting, technology and outsourcing services.
Cloud Infrastructure Services is one of the biggest outsourcing service providers in Poland. Since the establishment of our first service center in Krakow in 2004, it has achieved great success and grown rapidly. In 2006, we opened a second center in Katowice and in 2012 a third center in Opole. Today, our team of 2,000 professionals delivers IT outsourcing services to 40 clients in 20 languages.

Position purpose:
You will be hired at Capgemini IS Infra Software House business unit is a part of Capgemini Eastern Europe Infrastructure Services Global Delivery Centre.
 This ServiceNow Technical Consultant role is to assist in technical aspects of implementation of Service Management and Service Integration and Management solutions for our existing and prospective clients.

Your team:
You’ll be working in the Application Delivery team based in Kraków/Katowice. We are the experienced team responsible for end to end enterprise application development process using various technologies (including but not limited to: .NET, Microsoft SharePoint, PHP, BMC Remedy, Service Now). We are highly independent, capable in Agile Process and Lean Software Engineering practices.

Main accountabilities:
In collaboration with Service Integration and Management consultants, You will assist clients in the implementation of IT Service Management practices based on Capgemini and industry standards. Will be responsible for leveraging IT Service Management and other IT Practices to optimize, transform, and ensure IT Organizations are compliant, efficient, and effective using the ServiceNow platform.
 The role requires thorough knowledge of ServiceNow tool and technologies used within the tool.

Candidate’s profile:
~Strong desire to learn new technology
~Deliverable focus
~Strong sense of team 
~Collaborative approach 
~Strong desire for career advancement 
~Customer Service mindset


What’ll make You special:
~Demonstrable (1-2 years) experience with ServiceNow platform navigation, administration, configuration, and scripting
~ServiceNow System Administration (or higher) certifications desired
~Previous experience in administration and configuration of other ITSM Tools (Remedy, BMC Magic, etc.) is a plus 
~Background in either software development or IT Service management
~Understanding of Agile based approach to software development (SCRUM experience is a plus)
~Working knowledge of web technologies: JavaScript, XML, HTML, CSS, etc.
~Service Now Scripting certificate is a plus
~Working knowledge of relational databases
~Working knowledge of LDAP, AD, SSO, Email Infrastructure, Web Services is a plus
~Experience in monitoring/analyzing systems performance and availability is a plus
~Ability to work remotely and largely unsupervised, and to deliver to written requirements
~Ability to work with a remote team, requiring ability to communicate well via phone and email (writing skills)
~ITIL® Certified – Intermediate or higher level is a plus
~Knowledge about programming languages as C#/.NET, Java, PHP is a plus
~Strong attention to detail
~Excellent command of English language
~Readiness for business travel (up to 50% travelling abroad)


What we offer:
~Possibility of full time remote work.
~You will work in multinational, stable company for c.a. 100 Blue Chip Clients - known, global brands, supported by 6000  professionals in 30 languages
~You will gain space to fulfill your ambitions and develop your career, opportunity to take part in transition projects. We operate according to Lean and Kaizen philosophy.
~You will choose your career path (experts or managers) – you will work among professionals (over 900). We will support you to gain knowledge (20 000 online trainings and in class) and get certified (e.g. ITIL, Vmware, Citrix, Oracle Database). You will have the opportunity to take part in coaching programs and develop your knowledge in experts communities.
~You will work in line with high, international work standards and you will have an opportunity to engage in CSR initiatives.
~You will be appreciated for your results and professionalism – based on clear rules of promotion. Our company applies a wide choice of perks (free private medical care for you and your family, additional life insurance). We help to keep right proportions between your work and private life (Business Parent Program).


Interested candidates are invited to apply online.
Please be advised that Capgemini Poland Sp. z o.o. located in Warsaw, Al. Jerozolimskie 96, is the controller of personal data provided by you in the recruitment applications. Your personal data will be processed in accordance with the Personal Data Protection Act of 29 August 1997 (Journal of Laws2002, No. 101, item. 926 with further amendments) for the purpose of existing and future recruitment processes. Please be advised that in scope of recruitment process your personal data will be processed by the controller and sub-processors located outside European Economic Area including India’s entity. Data submission is voluntary. Every person has the right to access their data in order to correct it or delete it”
 Please include following statement in your application: "I hereby authorize Capgemini Poland Sp. z o.o. to process my personal data included in my job application for existing and future recruitment processes (in accordance with the Personal Data Protection August 1997, Journal of Laws 2002, No. 101, item. 926 with further amendments).I also authorize Capgemini Poland Sp z o.o. to sub-process my personal data outside European Economic Area including India’s entity, which may also include Capgemini’s clients within and outside of EEA."
 We protect your privacy. We kindly inform you that we contact only chosen candidates.The recruitment process is conducted in accordance with the principles of equal treatment in employment, Labor Code, Chapter IIa, Art. 183a– 183e.

9067185606495264863.company_name: Philip Morris International Service Center Europe
9067185606495264863.title: Job in Finance - Contract of Services
9067185606495264863.text:
… SO APPLY AS 
Job in Finance - Contract of Services
Location: Kraków 
Are you inquisitive and self-driven? Will you make a difference to our company and your colleagues around you?
If the answer is yes, ja, oui or igen, then we’d like to hear from you.
WE ARE LOOKING TO RECRUIT
~University degree or 3-5 year of study, preferably in Finance, Accounting, Economics or Management
~a fast learner with good organizational skills and attention to details
~Ability to set priorities and solve problems
~action-oriented candidates with fluency in English and experience in using Microsoft Office tools (Excel, Word, Outlook)
~Knowledge of additional languages will be an asset (French, German, Spanish etc.)

RISE TO THE CHALLENGE
PMI Service Center Europe Sp. z.o.o (PMI SCE) is seeking talented people to join our team in Finance Department in Krakow, Poland to support it in daily activities on the basis of Contract of Services for duration of 6 months with possibility to extend.
 You will provide professional services to PMI SCE customers & PMI affiliates and maintain PMI databases and systems. You will be exposed to an international environment with a high diversity of documents, processes and contacts.
FIND A NEW PATH
Our company offers you a fresh perspective. Here, you will never stop exploring and discovering. We take on-the-job learning to another level, giving you every opportunity to develop your career and reach your full potential. With innovative technologies, services, and processes, backed by a competitive salary, you will work in a professional setting and receive necessary trainings needed to perform your job.
 JOIN A GLOBAL MARKET LEADER
Philip Morris International Inc. (PMI) is the leading international tobacco company, with seven of the world’s top 15 brands, including the number one cigarette brand worldwide.
 PMI SCE was established in late 2005 in Krakow and since then is increasingly serving PMI affiliates’ Finance, Human Resources (HR), Procurement, Supply Chain, Quality Assurance and Information Services (IS) needs in Europe, Middle East and Africa. 
 
Interested? Motivated? Apply on-line in English at
 by 20.12.2016
Please note that only on-line applications will be taken into consideration. Only selected candidates will be contacted.

278225350863003042.title: Junior HR Specialist with Spanish
278225350863003042.text:
Did you know... ...there is a company whose associates choose to work there because their personal values align with the company’s core purpose of “Helping all people live healthy lives?”

"BD is a leading medical technology company that partners with customers and stakeholders to address many of the world’s most pressing and evolving health needs. Our innovative solutions are focused on improving medication management and patient safety; supporting infection prevention practices; equipping surgical and interventional procedures; improving drug delivery; aiding anesthesiology and respiratory care; advancing cellular research and applications; enhancing the diagnosis of infectious diseases and cancers; and supporting the management of diabetes. We are more than 45,000 associates in 50 countries who strive to fulfill our purpose of “Helping all people live healthy lives” by advancing the quality, accessibility, safety and affordability of healthcare around the world. In 2015, BD welcomed CareFusion and its products into the BD family of solutions. For more information on BD, please visit 

Junior HR Specialist
with Spanish

Main objective of role
~Providing proactive administrative support to employees of BD via phone and email
~Answering inquiries and resolving problems of basic to moderate complexity
~Actively re-directing incoming callers to self-service options through call scripts
~Supporting clients with being self-sufficient by teaching them how to use direct access tools and the knowledge management portal
~Building good relationships with the customers
~Managing computerized system for tracking and information gathering
~Executing standard processes in Workday system

Requirements
~Fluent command of English
~Very good command of Spanish language is a must
~1-2 years related experience in a customer service environment (HR call center experience is desirable)
~Excellent oral and written communication skills
~Ability to resolve routine problems and questions independently 
~Ability to pay close attention to details and use time effectively     
~Multi-tasking capabilities to manage several caseloads
~Experience using a Human Resource Information System is desirable, especially Workday

We are offering
~Working in an international company, first-in-class in its business area 
~Opportunity for professional growth - challenging and rewarding work with dynamic, international team

-7413873896619746760.title: Senior Business Intelligence Consultant
-7413873896619746760.text:
Senior Business Intelligence Consultant
Place of work: Krakow
About us
Capgemini Infrastructure Services is one of the biggest outsourcing service providers in Poland. IS has achieved great success and grown rapidly since the establishment of our first service center in Krakow in 2004. In 2006, we opened a second center in Katowice and in 2012 a third center in Opole. Today, our team of 2,000 professionals delivers IT outsourcing services to 40 clients in 20 languages.
Job description:
~Providing expertise in the design, development and operation of business intelligence and analytics solutions for external and internal customers. 
~Engaging with customers to understand and translate business requirements into operational designs. 
~Continually aligning BI and reporting project requirements to broader IT strategies and architectures.
~Maintaining technical competency, participating in vendor and customer meetings and assisting in advancing the Business Intelligence services.
~Driving continuous improvements to keep BI architecture and solutions aligned with current and future business needs.


Main accountabilities:
~Developing conceptual and logical data models for building effective decision support systems. 
~Translating conceptual design specifications in close collaboration with business owners, and design and develop BI solutions. 
~Capturing business, technical and operational requirements and create / communicate business intelligence options (ETLs, cubes, analytics). 
~Developing and testing programs to extract, cleanse, transform and load from source systems into Data Warehouse or/and other data technologies (i.e. “In Memory”, QVD etc.). 
~Serving as application administrator for ETL/BI tools. 
~Building Management, Operational, and ad hoc reports. 
~Developing quality control measures, testing measures, and the accuracy of data standards to support deployment of solutions for the business. 
~Responsibility for gathering and assessing business information needs and preparing data and reporting requirements.
~Performing analysis, developing and evaluating of data mining in a data warehouse environment which includes data design, database architecture, metadata and repository creation. 
~Reviewing and validating data loaded into the data warehouse for accuracy. 
~Providing technical consulting to users and advising them on conflicts and inappropriate data usage. 
~Responsibility for prototyping solutions, preparing test scripts, and conducting tests and for data replication, extraction, loading, cleansing, and data modelling for data warehouses.


Candidate’s profile:
~Ability to think objectively and make sound business and technical decisions.
~Ability to motivate and inspire an BI/Analytics other team members.
~Effective business communication and presentation skills.
~Flexibility, strong interpersonal, analytical, technical and problem solving attributes.
~Understanding the IT environment well and specializations within IT and relationship building with customers to meet their needs.
~Expertise in data modelling, data integration (i.e. SSIS, Qlik View load script) and Reporting tools.
~Work history of successful software/BI Solution design and utilization of one or more BI technologies:

- Microsoft BI (SSRS, SSIS, SSAS, Power BI etc.)
- Qlik Tech (Qlik View/Qlik Sense)
- Tableau
- Oracle BI
- IBM Cognos
- SAP BI

What we offer:
You will work in multinational, stable company for c.a. 100 Blue Chip Clients - known, global brands, supported by 6000 professionals in 30 languages
You will gain space to fulfill your ambitions and develop your career, opportunity to take part in transition projects. We operate according to Lean and Kaizen philosophy.
You will choose your career path (experts or managers) – you will work among professionals (over 900). We will support you to gain knowledge (20 000 online trainings and in class) and get certified (e.g. ITIL, Vmware, Citrix, Oracle Database). You will have the opportunity to take part in coaching programs and develop your knowledge in experts communities.
You will work in line with high, international work standards and you will have an opportunity to engage in CSR initiatives. 
You will be appreciated for your results and professionalism – based on clear rules of promotion. Our company applies a wide choice of perks (free private medical care for you and your family, additional life insurance). We help to keep right proportions between your work and private life (Business Parent Program)

Interested candidates are invited to apply online.
Please be advised that Capgemini Poland Sp. z o.o. located in Warsaw, Al. Jerozolimskie 96, is the controller of personal data provided by you in the recruitment applications. Your personal data will be processed in accordance with the Personal Data Protection Act of 29 August 1997 (Journal of Laws2002, No. 101, item. 926 with further amendments) for the purpose of existing and future recruitment processes. Please be advised that in scope of recruitment process your personal data will be processed by the controller and sub-processors located outside European Economic Area including India’s entity. Data submission is voluntary. Every person has the right to access their data in order to correct it or delete it”
Please include following statement in your application: "I hereby authorize Capgemini Poland Sp. z o.o. to process my personal data included in my job application for existing and future recruitment processes (in accordance with the Personal Data Protection August 1997, Journal of Laws 2002, No. 101, item. 926 with further amendments).I also authorize Capgemini Poland Sp z o.o. to sub-process my personal data outside European Economic Area including India’s entity, which may also include Capgemini’s clients within and outside of EEA."
We protect your privacy. We kindly inform you that we contact only chosen candidates.The recruitment process is conducted in accordance with the principles of equal treatment in employment, Labor Code, Chapter IIa, Art. 183a– 183e.

-617174472912083481.title: Customer Service Agent with French
-617174472912083481.text:
Goldman Recruitment is a HR consultancy company that provides high quality Candidates for a variety of professions, with a particular specialization in the Finance sector. By utilizing Search & Selection and Executive Search methods we are able to quickly and efficiently locate and recommend Candidates with the required skills and talents.
For our Client, an international company located in Lodz, we are looking for Candidates who want to be a part of a global organisation for a position of:


Customer Service Agent with French
Location: Lodz
 Salary attractive
 Responsibilities: 
~acting as a first point of contact for both internal and external Clients,
~resolving variety of requests received via all mediums (phone, email, fax) according to agreed service levels and standards,
~providing aid and assisting Customers with all issues that may arise,
~working across multiple brands and building up knowledge and experience in each to offer consistent service delivery across the group,
~supporting team mates who work in other brands, to ensure that we work as one team to achieve set targets.


Requirements: 
~very good command of English(B2) and French(B2),
~previous experience in Customer Care area is necessary,
~high level of communication skills,
~ability to work under time pressure,
~desire to work in an international and rapidly developing company.


The offer: 
~work in reputable company based on contract of employment,
~attractive salary based on your professional experience and skills,
~professional development in a dynamic and growing business,
~challenging job in a professional and multinational environment,
~opportunity to gain skills, knowledge and experience, together with highly marketable specialists,
~attractive social benefit package such as private medical care, life insurance, MultiSport card etc.

-6766146042846207897.title: MIS Analyst
-6766146042846207897.text:
Citi Service Center (CSC) is an initiative to establish a network of service centers providing high quality services to other entities operating within the Citi Group.
Citi Service Center Poland was founded in 2005, and it currently employs over 3000 highly qualified staff in three locations: Warsaw, Olsztyn and Lodz. CSC cooperates with other Citi entities from all over the world.
Currently we provide services to over 60 countries in Europe, Asia, Africa, both Americas and Australia. Our employees use over 24 languages every day. Working in our organization involves working on international projects, in an international and dynamic environment as well as learning the top quality organizational culture.   Candidates interested in this job position are asked to apply by the Citi Careers Apply button below
  Read more about career opportunities at: careeratciti.pl or facebook.com/citigradsemea 

Citi Service Center Poland


 MIS Analyst

Work place: Warszawa
16081089
Description

~Constant cooperation with all the teams and their support in KPI measurement,
~Preparing reports for senior management and platinum clients,
~Leading various MIS projects, including process migrations,
~Creating new reporting processes,
~Constant improvement and automation of data gathering and reporting processes,
~Identification of process risks and inefficiencies along with the implementation of improvements needed
~Answering custom and standard queries from both internal and external Clients.
~Organizing and leading phone conferences.

Qualifications

~Strong English (both spoken and written) skills are a must,
~Proficiency in MS Office (VBA, SQL knowledge as a strong asset)
~PowerPoint - very good.
~Experience in KPI monitoring & reporting
~Experience in running large projects,
~Experience in creating reporting processes from end to end (covering project manager, data analyst and technical duties).
~Reliability, problem solving, willingness to work under pressure,
~High analytical skills,
~High level attention to detail as well as seeing the big picture,
~Basic financial markets knowledge.


Please be informed that we will contact selected candidates only.
You are kindly requested to include the following clause in your application: “I hereby give my consent to the processing of my personal data included in my job application for the purpose of the recruitment process and after its completion for the purpose of future recruitments (pursuant to the Personal Data Protection Act as of 29 August 1997, Journal of Laws No. 133, item 883).

7121520131865490294.title: Senior Finance & Accounting Process Specialist French Speaker
7121520131865490294.title_normalized: senior financ accounting process specialist french speaker
7121520131865490294.text:
Senior Finance & Accounting Process Specialist French Speaker
Place of work: Krakow
About us
Capgemini is one of the world's foremost providers of consulting, technology and outsourcing services.
Capgemini Business Services department is one of the first and the biggest outsourcing centers in Poland providing services in 30 different languages in the areas of: finance, accounting, banking, procurement, customer care and marketing services. Business Services employs over 3800 specialists in its offices located in Krakow and Katowice.

Position purpose
New and interesting opportunity to work with a worldwide leader in Media & Entertainment. The company has operations around the globe and creates, distributes, markets and licenses all forms of entertainment from feature films to television, home video/DVD, international cinema, and broadcasting.
 We are looking for an experienced candidate, who is ready to be a part of Krakow Delivery Team - PTP processes.

Main accountabilities
~Vendor query resolution
~Processing discrepancies resolution
~Maintaining close interactions with teams within PTP
~Responsibility for delivery agreed scope of work  
~Working closely with the Client and maintaining good working relationship   
~Coordinating and escalating rush/emergency invoice requests from initial request to payment  
~Determining root cause of returned payments/payment rejections and provide resolution  
~Reviewing, researching and resolving to balance out debit/credit reports 
~Reviewing desktop procedures (DTPs) in conjunction with Global AP                 
~Performing pay audit
~Processing electronic and manual payments
~Preparing all ad-hoc, PTP-related tasks requested by management
~Researching and resolving Accounts Payable issues                                                            
~Determining if appropriate actions have been taken prior to escalation   
~Communicating resolution of item to Client within agreed upon time frames            
~Identifying root cause of repetitive problems                                           
~Proposing remedial actions to reduce future instances of repetitive problems  
~Work with territory business units to implement processes to resolve identified root causes       
~Engaging to provide AP subject matter expertise                                  
~Participating in scheduled status update calls with the client regarding operational issues          
~Monitoring business unit compliance with established AP Policies and Procedures          
~Working with business units to resolve areas of non-compliance


Requirements
~Very good knowledge of French in writing and speaking (C1)
~Good knowledge of English (B2)
~Understanding and at least 1 year of experience in Accounts Payable is a must, knowledge of payment processes would be an asset. 
~SAP knowledge will be an asset
~Ability to analyze end to end processes
~Good knowledge of MS Office Strong interpersonal skills and proactive approach
~Ability to work under pressure
~Very good customer service skills and Client-focus attitude
~Flexibility and ability to adapt to changing schedule of tasks


What we offer
~You will work in multinational, stable company for c.a. 100 Blue Chip Clients - known, global brands, supported by 6000 professionals in 30 languages.
~You will gain space to fulfill your ambitions and develop your career, opportunity to take part in transition projects. We operate according to Lean and Kaizen philosophy.
~You will choose your career path (experts or managers) – you will work among professionals (over 900). We will support you to gain knowledge (20 000 online trainings and in class) and get certified (e.g. ACCA, Prince2, PMP). You will have the opportunity to take part in coaching programs and develop your knowledge in experts communities.
~You will work in line with high, international work standards and you will have an opportunity to engage in CSR initiatives.
~You will be appreciated for your results and professionalism – based on clear rules of promotion. Our company applies a wide choice of perks (free private medical care for you and your family, additional life insurance). We help to keep right proportions between your work and private life (Business Parent Program).
~As a disabled person you will get professional support. We are open to provide assistive technologies for people with diverse disabilities. We care about inclusion and equal rights approach. We conduct disability awareness trainings. Join our Win with Capgemini Program for people with disabilities.


Interested candidates are invited to apply online.
Please be advised that Capgemini Poland Sp. z o.o. located in Warsaw, Al. Jerozolimskie 96, is the controller of personal data provided by you in the recruitment applications. Your personal data will be processed in accordance with the Personal Data Protection Act of 29 August 1997 (Journal of Laws2002, No. 101, item. 926 with further amendments) for the purpose of existing and future recruitment processes. -6036063452472019332.title: (Junior) Windows Engineer
-6036063452472019332.text:
(Junior) Windows Engineer
Place of work: Katowice
About us
Capgemini is one of the world's foremost providers of consulting, technology and outsourcing services.
Cloud Infrastructure Services is one of the biggest outsourcing service providers in Poland. Since the establishment of our first service center in Krakow in 2004, it has achieved great success and grown rapidly. In 2006, we opened a second center in Katowice and in 2012 a third center in Opole. Today, our team of 2,000 professionals delivers IT outsourcing services to 40 clients in 20 languages.

Position purpose
(Junior) Windows Engineer will be able to expand knowledge in Microsoft systems area through access to dedicated client’s environment and cooperation with high class specialists within our team. This position is dedicated for people strongly focused on technical skills development and motivated to achieve defined objectives.
This position is dedicated for people who would like to develop in operating systems area.

Job description
~Managing Microsoft OS environment
~Proposing enhancements to existing infrastructure
~Designing and implementing new solutions


Candidate’s profile
~Analytical and methodical approach to problem solving
~Self motivation and able to work within a team or autonomous
~Able to work under pressure and meet tight deadlines


Requirements
Essential:
~Basic knowledge of Windows Server systems (2003 / 2008 / 2012 / 2016)
~Basic knowledge of DNS, DHCP and other Microsoft Network services
~Basic knowledge of Active Directory
~Good English language skills

 Nice to have:
~Ability to create and maintain scripts
~Virtualization (VMware is preferred)
~Experience in server hardware management (HP is preferred)
~Professional experience with Windows Server systems
~Knowledge of High availability solutions


What we offer
You will work in multinational, stable company for c.a. 100 Blue Chip Clients - known, global brands, supported by 6000  professionals in 30 languages
You will gain space to fulfill your ambitions and develop your career, opportunity to take part in transition projects. We operate according to Lean and Kaizen philosophy
You will choose your career path (experts or managers) – you will work among professionals (over 900). We will support you to gain knowledge (20 000 online trainings and in class) and get certified (e.g. ITIL, Vmware, Citrix, Oracle Database)
You will have the opportunity to take part in coaching programs and develop your knowledge in experts communities
You will work in line with high, international work standards and you will have an opportunity to engage in CSR initiatives
You will be appreciated for your results and professionalism – based on clear rules of promotion. Our company applies a wide choice of perks (free private medical care for you and your family, additional life insurance). We help to keep right proportions between your work and private life (Business Parent Program)

Interested candidates are invited to apply online.
Please be advised that Capgemini Poland Sp. z o.o. located in Warsaw, Al. Jerozolimskie 96, is the controller of personal data provided by you in the recruitment applications. Your personal data will be processed in accordance with the Personal Data Protection Act of 29 August 1997 (Journal of Laws2002, No. 101, item. 926 with further amendments) for the purpose of existing and future recruitment processes. Please be advised that in scope of recruitment process your personal data will be processed by the controller and sub-processors located outside European Economic Area including India’s entity. Data submission is voluntary. Every person has the right to access their data in order to correct it or delete it”
 Please include following statement in your application: "I hereby authorize Capgemini Poland Sp. z o.o. to process my personal data included in my job application for existing and future recruitment processes (in accordance with the Personal Data Protection August 1997, Journal of Laws 2002, No. 101, item. 926 with further amendments).I also authorize Capgemini Poland Sp z o.o. to sub-process my personal data outside European Economic Area including India’s entity, which may also include Capgemini’s clients within and outside of EEA."
 We protect your privacy. We kindly inform you that we contact only chosen candidates.The recruitment process is conducted in accordance with the principles of equal treatment in employment, Labor Code, Chapter IIa, Art. 183a– 183e.

-2496323853438912446.title: Procurement Process Specialist French Speaker
-2496323853438912446.text:
Procurement Process Specialist French Speaker
Place of work: Krakow
About us
Capgemini is one of the world's foremost providers of consulting, technology and outsourcing services.
Capgemini Business Services department is one of the first and the biggest outsourcing centers in Poland providing services in 30 different languages in the areas of: finance, accounting, banking, procurement, customer care and marketing services. Business Services employs over 3800 specialists in its offices located in Krakow and Katowice.

Main accountabilities
~Receiving and reviewing procurement system service requests (resolution of vendor and customer queries, Master Data requests, Orders approval, report’s creation)
~Being an escalation point for complex queries
~Processing files documents according to procedures for audit purposes
~Continually striving to identify opportunities to simplify, standardize and improve processes
~Proactively sharing knowledge and best practices
~Continually seeking out ways to improve Client satisfaction


Requirements
~Very good knowledge of French (B2/C1)
~Good knowledge of English  (B2)
~Minimum 1 year of experience in Customer Service roles
~Experience in Procurement or Accounts Payable area would be an asset
~Very good Customer Service skills and Client focus attitude
~Strong communication and interpersonal skills
~Good analytical and problem solving skills, attention to detail
~Ability to work under pressure
~Well organized and able to prioritize tasks


What we offer
~You will work in multinational, stable company for c.a. 100 Blue Chip Clients - known, global brands, supported by 6000 professionals in 30 languages.
~You will gain space to fulfill your ambitions and develop your career, opportunity to take part in transition projects. We operate according to Lean and Kaizen philosophy.
~You will choose your career path (experts or managers) – you will work among professionals (over 900). We will support you to gain knowledge (20 000 online trainings and in class) and get certified (e.g. ACCA, Prince2, PMP). You will have the opportunity to take part in coaching programs and develop your knowledge in experts communities.
~You will work in line with high, international work standards and you will have an opportunity to engage in CSR initiatives.
~You will be appreciated for your results and professionalism – based on clear rules of promotion. Our company applies a wide choice of perks (free private medical care for you and your family, additional life insurance). We help to keep right proportions between your work and private life (Business Parent Program).
~As a disabled person you will get professional support. We are open to provide assistive technologies for people with diverse disabilities. We care about inclusion and equal rights approach. We conduct disability awareness trainings. Join our Win with Capgemini Program for people with disabilities


Interested candidates are invited to apply online.

2867213435449692330.title: IT Test Lead
2867213435449692330.text:
IT Test Lead
Location: Gdynia

Kamil from Lublin
Tasks
~Make sure that the QA plan for the team is built and implemented in
practice in collaboration with the whole team
~Work pro-actively, in close cooperation with Business and Product Owners
~Driving continuous improvement and best practices within as well as across the teams
~Contributing directly to team’s testing by planning, specifying, implementing and executing tests
~Ensuring that the test tool chain meets teams’ needs
~Ensuring the availability of  test environment and test data
~Providing online visibility to quality of deliverables
~Understanding and addressing testing skill gaps in teams


Required profile
~BS/MS in Computer Science, Engineering or related subject
~3+ years of experience in the field of QA engineering
~You exhibit a strong understanding of Agile software development from requirements to final quality assurance
~You are fluent in test methodologies and processes
~You have worked in international and cross-country environments
~You are familiar with banking; preferably with Core Banking systems
~In your previous positions, you have succeeded with defining, executing and reporting tests for complex software systems
~You have hands-on test automation experience with CI frameworks and source code control tools
~You are familiar with BDD/TDD concepts and have the ability to practically implement themou are confident with tools like HP QC, JIRA, HP UFT, and Selenium


We offer
~Attractive salary adequate to your skills and experience
~The chance to co-create innovative projects for leaders in telecommunication, insurance, banking/finance and other sectors
~Possibility to develop by switching between preferred projects, technologies and sectors
~Private health care, Multisport package and group insurance
~Lots of memorable integration parties for you and your family
~Relocation packages available for those who decide to move and work with us
~Stable employment in the Best Place to Work in IT in Poland!


Interested individuals are encouraged to send their resume with reference number to :
rekrutacja-gdansk@pl.sii.eu
together with an approval for the processing of personal data listed below:
„I hereby agree for the processing of my personal data by Sii Sp. z o. o, Al. Niepodległości 69, 02-626 Warszawa, enclosed in the application documents submitted by me, including their processing in the future - for the purpose of the recruitment process. This consent is submitted voluntarily and I declare that I have been informed of the powers I am entitled to in accordance with the Protection of Personal Data Act from August 29, 1997 (consolidated version: Journal of Laws from 2002, No. 101., item 926. with amendments".
Please note that we will contact only selected candidates.

-3459334475072792119.title: Senior Java Developer
-3459334475072792119.text:
Senior Java Developer
Location: Wrocław

Kamil from Lublin
Tasks
~Analyzing, debugging and/or assisting in problem solving in both development and production environments
~Working with all phases of the systems development lifecycle
~Assuring code quality and adherence to coding standards on projects
~Working with a team responsible for the development and maintenance of the applications 
~Designing solutions and writing technical specification


Required profile
~Minimum 8 years of experience in JAVA programming 
~Knowledge and understanding of current best practices in Core Java and J2EE development
~Experience with Oracle DB and Linux environment 
~Knowledge of messaging (EMS, MQ Series) 
~Experience in working with distributed and enterprise systems, SOA
~Good experience in RDBMS
~Good English skills
~Java technology fundamentals and design patterns used in real time transaction processing systems
~Experience in building distributed caching systems.
~Experience in high performance and high availability systems
~Team oriented, independent and proactive

Nice to have:
~Experience with Coherence and it’s runtime environment
~Bloomberg TOMS experience


We offer
~Interesting cooperation with specialists from various fields (Web, embedded, mobile)
~A wide variety of training packages: technical trainings, soft skills courses, English/Polish classes
~Access to our technical library, e-learning portals and „knowledge sharing" meetings
~Multilingual, Multicultural creative work environment
~Possibility to design your own career path
~Possibility to develop by switching between preferred projects, technologies and sectors
~Clear and concise feedback system
~An opportunity to work in the company where your opinions are important and taken into account
~Private health care, multisport package and group insurance
~Lots of memorable integration parties for you and your family
~Relocation packages available for those who decide to move and work with us in Wrocław
~Stable employment In the Best place to work in IT In Poland!

3293258954814304136.title_normalized: перенос сайт из конструктор в cms на интернациона хостин удален
3293258954814304136.text:
Всем привет! 
Есть сайт на конструкторе, нужно перевести на CMS и залить на хостинг. Желательно WordPress или другие, популярные в Европе. 

Вот ссылка на сайт - 

Основной функционал должен остаться, возможно, конечно с небольшими изменениями. 
Причина переноса - медленность ресурса. Нужен более быстрый хостинг, расположенный в европе. 
Желательно не сложное использование Админкой.

935070247514820810.title: Дизайн стола (удаленно)
935070247514820810.text: требуется сделать дизайн и модель изделия, столешница в автомобиль. Стол в авто на заднем сидении расположен посередине, упирается в спинку, максимальная длина 62 см, максимальная ширина 34 см, высота столешницы от сидения 20 см. Крепления 1 есть, 2 нужно. Функциональность стола - для делового человека, возможность работы с документами, поставить ноутбук, для детей рисовать играть, для дальних поездок чтобы была возможность перекусить. Стол будет обтянут экокожей. Размеры даны максимальные, т.е. можете играть внутри этих пределов. Требования к дизайну попроще, чтобы не усложнять производство, и чтобы стол не стыдно было ставить в дорогую машину.

-3112167345346698547.text:
Требуется реализовать несколько программ (или одну единую) для фейсбука: 
1) Регистратор аккаунтов 
2) Инвайт в группы/друзья 
3) Постинг в группы и к себе на страницу 
4) Парсер групп пользователя/по запросам 
5) Парсер участников 
6) Парсер людей по критериям 
7) Лайкинг 
И, вероятнее всего, ещё ряд задач. Идеально, если вы уже имели опыт в автоматизации FB, но не обязательно. 
С грамотными программистами готов сотрудничать очень долго, задачи есть всегда, по оплате договоримся :)

-7454859909183254091.title: Reporting Engineer
-7454859909183254091.text:
Reporting Engineer
Place of work: Katowice, Krakow
About us
Capgemini is one of the world's foremost providers of consulting, technology and outsourcing services.
Capgemini Business Services department is one of the first and the biggest outsourcing centers in Poland providing services in 30 different languages in the areas of: finance, accounting, banking, procurement, customer care and marketing services. Business Services employs over 3800 specialists in its offices located in Krakow and Katowice.

Main responsibility
~Independently work on user and high priority tickets, service or Change Requests, troubleshooting faults and interfacing with external vendors as well as internal Capgemini engagement representatives
~Create in SQL: Databases, Tables, Cluster/Non-Cluster Index, Unique/Check Constraints, Views, Stored Procedures, Triggers, Functions and views, Performance tuning of queries
~Gather, Understand and Successfully Translate business requirements into technical specifications
~Flexible work schedule to handle emergency outage or other situations with ability to work on or resolve issues while out of the office
~Enforce and follow existing policy procedures used to configure and maintain various portions of Cisco Telephony and their associated systems
~Coordinate effort and communication between geographically and time separated groups


Requirements
Must have:
~High level core on T-SQL
~Extensive experience in using SQL server 2008/2012
~Basic knowledge in SSIS
~Experience in handling large amount of data and preparing reports
~Good English language skills
~Very good communication skill

Nice to have:
~Basic knowledge of .Net
~Experience in developing reports in SSIS package
~CUIC Reporting experience
~Basic knowledge of Cisco Unified Communications Manager (CUCM) CDR reporting and Cisco Unified Contact Center Enterprise


What we offer
~You will work in multinational, stable company for c.a. 100 Blue Chip Clients- known, global brands, supported by 6000 professionals in 30 languages.
~You will gain space to fulfill your ambitionsand develop your career, opportunity to take part in transition projects. We operate according to Lean and Kaizen
~You will choose your career path (experts or managers) – you will work among professionals (over 900). We will support you to gain knowledge (20 000online trainings and in class) and get certified  (e.g. ACCA, Prince2, PMP). You will have the opportunity to take part in coaching programs and develop your knowledge in experts communities.
~You will work in line with high, international work standards and you will have an opportunity to engage in CSR initiatives.
~You will be appreciated for your results and professionalism – based on clear rules of promotion. Our company applies a wide choice of perks(free private medical care for you and your family, additional life insurance). We help to keep right proportions between your work and private life (Business Parent Program).
~As a disabled person you will get professional support. We are open to provide assistive technologies for people with diverse disabilities. We care about inclusion and equal rights approach. We conduct disability awareness trainings. Join our Win with Capgemini Program for people with disabilities.


Interested candidates are invited to apply online.
Please be advised that Capgemini Poland Sp. z o.o. located in Warsaw, Al. Jerozolimskie 96, is the controller of personal data provided by you in the recruitment applications. Your personal data will be processed in accordance with the Personal Data Protection Act of 29 August 1997 (Journal of Laws2002, No. 101, item. 926 with further amendments) for the purpose of existing and future recruitment processes. Please be advised that in scope of recruitment process your personal data will be processed by the controller and sub-processors located outside European Economic Area including India’s entity. Data submission is voluntary. Every person has the right to access their data in order to correct it or delete it”
 Please include following statement in your application: "I hereby authorize Capgemini Poland Sp. z o.o. to process my personal data included in my job application for existing and future recruitment processes (in accordance with the Personal Data Protection August 1997, Journal of Laws 2002, No. 101, item. 926 with further amendments).I also authorize Capgemini Poland Sp z o.o. to sub-process my personal data outside European Economic Area including India’s entity, which may also include Capgemini’s clients within and outside of EEA."
 We protect your privacy. We kindly inform you that we contact only chosen candidates.The recruitment process is conducted in accordance with the principles of equal treatment in employment, Labor Code, Chapter IIa, Art. 183a– 183e.

-6808802267514691796.text:
Citi Service Center (CSC) is an initiative to establish a network of service centers providing high quality services to other entities operating within the Citi Group.
Citi Service Center Poland was founded in 2005, and it currently employs over 3000 highly qualified staff in three locations: Warsaw, Olsztyn and Lodz. CSC cooperates with other Citi entities from all over the world.
Currently we provide services to over 60 countries in Europe, Asia, Africa, both Americas and Australia. Our employees use over 24 languages every day. Working in our organization involves working on international projects, in an international and dynamic environment as well as learning the top quality organizational culture.   Candidates interested in this job position are asked to apply by the Citi Careers Apply button below
  Read more about career opportunities at: careeratciti.pl or facebook.com/citigradsemea 

Citi Service Center Poland


 Reconciliation Specialist

Work place: Warszawa
16067471
Description

Key Responsibilities:
~Routing of MT950 & MT940 statements on a daily basis and investigate unidentified items
~Reconciling the daily transactions related to Securities Treasury Settlements in various Nostro Accounts.
~Identify any differences (breaks) between the bank's positions on accounts held with custodians.
~Publish outstanding entries to all user and management.
~Ensure that daily deliverables are completed timely and accurately based on agreed service levels.
~Cooperate with other teams/operations in scope of performed responsibilities.
~Confirm the accuracy and completeness of transactions, reviewing accounts for discrepancies or irregularities
~Timely and effective escalation of all issues to Senior Management that fall outside normal resolution timeframe
~Prepare monthly reconciliation packages

Qualifications

Requirements / Qualifications:
~Degree with at least 2-4 years’ experience in banking industry
~Experience in matching and allocation, investigation and reviews and good in resolution management
~Excellent spoken and written English
~Proficient in Microsoft Office
~Ability to work well under pressure and meet tight and changing deadlines
~Open to work on public holidays and weekends


Please be informed that we will contact selected candidates only.
You are kindly requested to include the following clause in your application: “I hereby give my consent to the processing of my personal data included in my job application for the purpose of the recruitment process and after its completion for the purpose of future recruitments (pursuant to the Personal Data Protection Act as of 29 August 1997, Journal of Laws No. 133, item 883).

8066790961026261118.text:
Citi Service Center (CSC) is an initiative to establish a network of service centers providing high quality services to other entities operating within the Citi Group.
Citi Service Center Poland was founded in 2005, and it currently employs over 3000 highly qualified staff in three locations: Warsaw, Olsztyn and Lodz. CSC cooperates with other Citi entities from all over the world.
Currently we provide services to over 60 countries in Europe, Asia, Africa, both Americas and Australia. Our employees use over 24 languages every day. Working in our organization involves working on international projects, in an international and dynamic environment as well as learning the top quality organizational culture.   Candidates interested in this job position are asked to apply by the Citi Careers Apply button below
  Read more about career opportunities at: careeratciti.pl or facebook.com/citigradsemea 

Citi Service Center Poland


 Product Control Lead Analyst

Work place: Warszawa
16059934
Description

Job purpose:
This role is for Lead Analyst to lead a newly created Capital Market Origination (CMO) and Corporate Portfolio Management (CPM) Product Control Teams in CSC Poland.
The role will be part of the Product Control group in Warsaw.  The purpose of Product Control is to ensure the completeness, accuracy and integrity of the banks books and records.
Product Control:-
·         is an independent control function
·         provides financial understanding and insight into revenues and balance sheet
·         ensures appropriate valuation
·         is a key business partner to internal and external stakeholders
Job Background / context:
Product Control is the largest department in Finance with responsibility for analyzing revenue drivers through risk positioning and market movements, controlling trading and banking books activity, evaluation of fair value of the books, price verification, integrity of data used in financial reporting and external disclosures.
Product Control cooperates closely with all other areas of the business including the Trading desks, Risk Management, Operations, and other areas of Finance and develops good understanding of the products traded, along with the associated market risks and accounting complexities.
We offer unique opportunity to get to know all the full range of institutional and investment banking products in the working practice of a globally leading multinational financial services conglomerate.
Our Warsaw office is deeply integrated part of the EMEA Regional Hub, establishing direct contact with the Business, Finance and Risk areas in the regional centre.
Key Responsibilities:
Managing 2 teams responsible for:
·         Review and analysis of daily profit and loss.  Includes: review and explanation of P&L movements to Business and Product Control management.
·         Performing month end P(L) and B/S control checks to ensure data integrity and accuracy of the reported numbers
·         Month-end reconciliation of the reported numbers
·         Driving improvements and standardise the control infrastructure.
·         Involvement in projects that arise relating to streamlining current processes and represent Finance on Business led initiatives.
·         Interaction with Traders, Planning & Analysis, Middle Office, Operations & Technology, Risk Management and Accounting Policy on review complex transactions for pricing, reserving and control issues
·         New products and complex transactions review
·         Reconciliation between front and back office systems
·         Documenting controls, ensuring escalation to senior management 
·         Ensuring that market-leading standards are achieved through continuous development and maintenance of strong controls
Development Value:
The successful candidate will have the opportunity to gain deep practical knowledge of banking products and financial instruments in the area of CMO and CPM , will have a blend of both excellent technical skills, as well as a strong control mindset and a firm grasp of accounting and market risk concepts while leading both teams.
Qualifications

Knowledge/Experience:
~Understanding of banking products and financial instruments
~Understanding of valuation and accounting concepts
~Ability to interpret financial information and deliver meaningful insight and analysis
~Drive process enhancement & change from the team members.

Skills:
~Very good analytical skills
~Fluent English
~Strong organization and planning skills.
~Strong communication skills, both written and oral. 
~Good interpersonal skills in being able to deal with a range of senior/junior staff across a number of disciplines.
~Very good command of Microsoft Excel.

Qualifications:
~Master’s degree in Economics, Quantitative Methods, Econometrics, Finance, Banking, Accounting, Computer Science, Mathematics
~At least 5 years of relevant job experience

Exceptional candidates who do not meet these criteria may be considered for the role provided they have the necessary skills and experience.
Competencies:
~An interest in finance and banking
~Theoretical knowledge of financial products
~Previous product control experience
~Ability to interpret and analyse financial information
~Ability to apply theoretical knowledge in a practical environment
~Able to perform effectively within a time pressurised environment.


Please be informed that we will contact selected candidates only.
You are kindly requested to include the following clause in your application: “I hereby give my consent to the processing of my personal data included in my job application for the purpose of the recruitment process and after its completion for the purpose of future recruitments (pursuant to the Personal Data Protection Act as of 29 August 1997, Journal of Laws No. 133, item 883).

2162064432548846072.title: Fund Accounting Manager
2162064432548846072.text:
Citi Service Center (CSC) is an initiative to establish a network of service centers providing high quality services to other entities operating within the Citi Group.
Citi Service Center Poland was founded in 2005, and it currently employs over 3000 highly qualified staff in three locations: Warsaw, Olsztyn and Lodz. CSC cooperates with other Citi entities from all over the world.
Currently we provide services to over 60 countries in Europe, Asia, Africa, both Americas and Australia. Our employees use over 24 languages every day. Working in our organization involves working on international projects, in an international and dynamic environment as well as learning the top quality organizational culture.   Candidates interested in this job position are asked to apply by the Citi Careers Apply button below
  Read more about career opportunities at: careeratciti.pl or facebook.com/citigradsemea 

Citi Service Center Poland


 Fund Accounting Manager

Work place: Warszawa
16082004
Description

Fund Accounting Department (part of a global unit Securities Services Operations (SSO)) is responsible for calculation and verification of the of the Net Asset Value (NAV) of Citi Clients’ funds in line with the fund prospectus.
This includes the monitoring and review of the activity taking place within the fund including but not limited to the verification of security trading, security valuations, corporate action events, income and expense accruals, derivative positions, and reconciliation of accounting records to the custodian.
 Responsibilities: 
~Planning team's work: setting goals and deadlines, as well as managing its structure to ensure the most efficient ways of meeting goals.
~Delegating tasks, monitoring tasks realization.
~Coaching and motivating people.
~Managing the potential and development planning, performance managing. Corrective actions taking, managing poor performers.
~Communication to ensure good understanding of the strategy, goals etc.
~Ensuring operational procedures correctness and update.
~Cooperating with internal and external clients.
~Preparing and updating operational and control procedures, as well as ensuring their execution.
~Delivering statistics and reports concerning the Section Supporting budgeting process for Department Supporting initiatives related to Continuity of Business (COB) process.
~Planning and controlling of initiatives aiming at increasing employees satisfaction.


Qualifications

Requirements: 
~Experience in managing the team in operational environment.

~Fluent command of English, both spoken and written, enabling daily business communication.

~Good knowledge of accounting as well as knowledge of capital market instruments.

~Strong motivation to develop within managerial path at Citi.
~Excellent communication skills.

~Team working attitude.


To our Employees we offer:
~Opportunity of professional development in the international and well-established company 
~Opportunity to broaden the practical knowledge how Capital Markets operate
~Social benefits (e.g. medical care, Benefit System, life insurance)
~Working with enthusiastic people


Please be informed that we will contact selected candidates only.
You are kindly requested to include the following clause in your application: “I hereby give my consent to the processing of my personal data included in my job application for the purpose of the recruitment process and after its completion for the purpose of future recruitments (pursuant to the Personal Data Protection Act as of 29 August 1997, Journal of Laws No. 133, item 883).

8245625696532177561.text:
ABAP Developer
Location: Wrocław

Kamil from Lublin
Tasks
~Taking part in complex development in SAP BRIM/CRM
~Building the new global tool billing
~Working in global environment in large scale projects
~Preparing test environment, integration testing, user acceptance test, key user training and transfer to maintenance organization

~Troubleshooting and problem resolution skills
~Knowledge of ABAP performance best practices and tuning including SQL trace, runtime analysis, code inspector, etc.

~Enhancement framework experience (BADI, Enhancement spot,
~User/Customer exits, BTE, etc,)
~Good English skills

Nice to have:

5567167700151765932.title: Senior IT Recruitment Specialist (French or German)
5567167700151765932.text:
Senior IT Recruitment Specialist (French or German)
Place of work: Katowice, Krakow
About us
Capgemini Business Process Outsourcing is one of the first and the biggest outsourcing centers in Poland providing services in 30 different languages in the areas of: finance, accounting, banking, procurement, customer care and marketing services. BPO employs over 3400 specialists in its offices located in Krakow and Katowice.

Job description
~Liaising with managers to ensure a full understanding of their requirements and preferences
~Sourcing applicants who meet the specified criteria for the positions within IT area
~Candidates pre-qualification (application screening, phone interviewing)
~Delivering suitable Candidates in response to the assigned requisitions
~Taking a proactive approach and building pipeline of candidates for particular roles
~Building strong positive relations with candidates as well as internal clients
~Promoting Capgemini brand on the market
~Effective cooperation with Capgemini teams worldwide
~Preparing various recruitment reports as required


Candidate’s profile
~Excellent German or French communication skills, both written and verbal
~Good knowledge of English
~Proven track record in recruitment for a range of positions - at least 2-3 years of experience
~At least 1 year of experience in recruitment and sourcing for senior technical/IT roles
~Previous experience in recruitment agency will be a plus
~Good organizational skills, ability to maintain high level of accuracy and to work to tight deadlines
~Self starter with ability to prioritize and manage multiple task
~Flexible person, easily adapting to changes, able to work in a very dynamic environment
~Strong Customer focus
~Ability to work effectively in an international environment


~Excellent German or French communication skills, both written and verbal
~Good knowledge of English
~Proven track record in recruitment for a range of positions - at least 2-3 years of experience
~At least 1 year of experience in recruitment and sourcing for senior technical/IT roles
~Previous experience in recruitment agency will be a plus
~Good organizational skills, ability to maintain high level of accuracy and to work to tight deadlines
~Self starter with ability to prioritize and manage multiple task
~Flexible person, easily adapting to changes, able to work in a very dynamic environment
~Strong Customer focus
~Ability to work effectively in an international environment


What we offer
You will work in multinational, stable company for c.a. 100 Blue Chip Clients - known, global brands, supported by 6000 professionals in 30 languages
You will gain space to fulfill your ambitions and develop your career, opportunity to take part in transition projects. We operate according to Lean and Kaizen philosophy.
You will choose your career path (experts or managers) – you will work among professionals (over 900). We will support you to gain knowledge (20 000 online trainings and in class) and get certified (e.g. ITIL, Vmware, Citrix, Oracle Database). You will have the opportunity to take part in coaching programs and develop your knowledge in experts communities.
You will work in line with high, international work standards and you will have an opportunity to engage in CSR initiatives. 
You will be appreciated for your results and professionalism – based on clear rules of promotion. Our company applies a wide choice of perks (free private medical care for you and your family, additional life insurance). We help to keep right proportions between your work and private life (Business Parent Program)

Interested candidates are invited to apply online.
Please be advised that Capgemini Poland Sp. z o.o. located in Warsaw, Al. Jerozolimskie 96, is the controller of personal data provided by you in the recruitment applications. Your personal data will be processed in accordance with the Personal Data Protection Act of 29 August 1997 (Journal of Laws2002, No. 101, item. 926 with further amendments) for the purpose of existing and future recruitment processes. Please be advised that in scope of recruitment process your personal data will be processed by the controller and sub-processors located outside European Economic Area including India’s entity. Data submission is voluntary. Every person has the right to access their data in order to correct it or delete it”
 Please include following statement in your application: "I hereby authorize Capgemini Poland Sp. z o.o. to process my personal data included in my job application for existing and future recruitment processes (in accordance with the Personal Data Protection August 1997, Journal of Laws 2002, No. 101, item. 926 with further amendments).I also authorize Capgemini Poland Sp z o.o. to sub-process my personal data outside European Economic Area including India’s entity, which may also include Capgemini’s clients within and outside of EEA."
 We protect your privacy. We kindly inform you that we contact only chosen candidates.The recruitment process is conducted in accordance with the principles of equal treatment in employment, Labor Code, Chapter IIa, Art. 183a– 183e.

-2393716854077423917.title: Водитель такси 7788 135 107 на личном автомобиле
-2393716854077423917.text: Группа компаний "БелавтоМар" приглашает водителей на личных автомобилях для работы в такси г. Минска. Опыт работы в такси более 10 лет на рынке. Прямой работодатель.  Консультация: - Индивидуальный подход и личная консультация по оформлению 1-2 дня. - Опишем методы работы всех лучших служб города: 135, 107, 7788 и др. и Вы сделаете выбор где вам удобнее работать.- - Предлогаем Вам пройти обучение курсов таксиста удобным для вас способом. Условия: - Оформление автомобиля за счет организации. - Оформляем как по договору подряда так и по трудовому договору (полный соц. пакет). - Свободный график работы - возможность работы по совместительству. - Предрейсовый осмотр врач / механик в любом районе города (круглосуточно). Требования: - личный автомобиль - медицинская справка - желание работать и зарабатывать Бонусы и скидки на весь период работы: - АКЦИЯ - приведи друга и получил 450 т. бел. руб. - Оклеим Ваш автомобиль БЕСПЛАТНО! - Свой магазин автозапчастей, мойка и сто на которых действуют скидки для наших водителей. - Поможем приобрести автомобиль в лизинг. - Предоставляем необходимое оборудование: WI-FI, терминалы для расчета пластиковыми карточками, рацию, таксометр. Наличие автомобиля. Мед. справка.

5106180526092386961.title: Consultant - Project Lead
5106180526092386961.text:
Infosys Poland is one of the biggest players in the outsourcing market, offering advanced and innovative services to its clients worldwide in the field of Finance and Accounting, Purchasing, IT and Consultancy. We are among the largest employers in the Lodz region and employ around 2500 specialists that provide services in nearly 30 languages.Currently we are looking for the candidate for the position of:

Consultant - Project Lead
Miejsce pracy:
 Key responsibilities: 
~Provide process expertise and advisory for Clients in the area of expertise (F&A, S&F, S&P)
~Define and design the world class processes and solutions
~Manage team of during engagements, guide the resources, monitor progress, keep all stakeholders informed and take ownership of deliverables
~To assure high quality and efficiency of projects/assignments according to Project Management Standards
~Work with Consultants/Sales in other geographies to identify prospective clients, understand client requirements and present solutions to clients
~Lead/support ‘Go to Market’ activities for their service – continuous update of toolkits, creation of marketing collateral and supporting marketing events


 
Requirements
~Experience in BPO/SSC or consulting area is an asset
~Minimum 2-5 years of professional experience as a Consultant/ Project Leader in multicultural organizations would be an asset
~Experience in designing and deployment of service delivery models in one of domains: finance, sales and fulfillment or procurement or project accounting
~Very good command of English
~Mobility up to 50% and readiness to work in highly changing environment
~PMI or Six Sigma certification will be an asset

   We offer to the candidates 
~Induction program
~Career development in the multinational company
~Unique opportunity to take part in international projects and gain experience with various businesses and working with middle and top management
~External and internal trainings program
~Competitive set of social packages to choose from

Diebold Nixdorf has been present in Poalnd since 1990 with head office in Warsaw as well as regional services in Krakow, Katowice, Wroclaw and Szczecin.

IT Support Advisor with French
Location: Warszawa
Ref. No: GCCC/FR/11/2016
Apply and grow together with us!

-125861373208946018.title: ITIL Process Coordinator with English and French
-125861373208946018.text:
Atos is an international IT services company. It employs circa 100 000 employees in 72 countries. In Poland Atos exists since 2000. Currently, more than 4 000 people are working in our offices in Bydgoszcz, Warsaw, Wroclaw, Gdansk, Lodz, Torun and Krakow. The company offers IT infrastructure management services, systems integration, outsourcing and IT consulting. Atos was four times awarded with the Great Place to Work certificate, winning top positions in the ranking of the Great Place to Work® Institute. Atos is the official global IT partner of the Olympic and Paralympic Games.

ITIL Process Coordinator with English and French
Ref. no: 218979
City: Bydgoszcz


Job Description
ITIL Process Coordinator  is responsible for supporting and executing the Incident or Problem or Change Management process raised by customer or Service Manager.

ITIL Process Coordinator:
- coordinates and manages Incident/Problem/Change Management process activities across the global factory and with external suppliers to agreed global and local SLAs 
 - executes the Incident/Problem/Change Management process tasks in adherence with global and local requirements 
- escalates risks and issues to relevant Incident/Problem/Change Managers or the Incident/Problem/Change Management Regional Process Owner 
- supports Incident/Problem/Change Management reporting (KPIs and customer SLAs) 
- assists the Incident/Problem/Change Management Regional Process Owner in driving Service management best-practice and process standarization across his GBU 
- assists the Incident/Problem/Change Management Regional Process Owner in ensuring consistent end-to-end application of the process across his GBU 
- monitors process compliance and coordinates CMDB updates taking into consideration updates from changes/incidents/problems 
- engages with others process participants to identify continuous service improvement for the change/incident/ problem management processes - produces documentation covering actions taken

Job Requirements
Mandatory
- interested in IT operations/service management
- able to demonstrate a working knowledge of ITIL Service Management framework or interest in gaining knowledge  
- good command of English and French (B2/C1 level) 
- excellent communication skills (written / verbal) 
- having a strong character, can do attitude and possess a quality driven and customer focused mindset 
- ability to work in tight deadlines and the ability to maintain focus whilst under pressure 
- motivated self-starter, with a keen interest in developing and implementing best practices and creative solutions to the services and the business 
- ability to identify problems and work to resolution (see things through) and to motivate others to complete tasks on time
Additional
- experience in ITIL processes in real environment
- capability to work as part of a global team effectively via phone and web conferences
- truly interested in process management and passionate in continual improvement
- Business Objects/Crystal Ball/Excel reporting skills are plus

Additional Information
This position is located in our office in Bydgoszcz.
We offer:
 - stable employment 
 - attractive salary 
 - participation in interesting project 
 - work in international environment 
 - contact with the latest IT technology 
 - training and development programs 
 - study of foreign languages 
 - unlimited access to e-learning 
 - private medical care 
 - additional life insurance 
 - subsidy for commuting 
 - MyBenefit System (e.g. Multisport)

4476395342401599102.title: Senior Auditor
4476395342401599102.text:
Citi Service Center (CSC) is an initiative to establish a network of service centers providing high quality services to other entities operating within the Citi Group.
Citi Service Center Poland was founded in 2005, and it currently employs over 3000 highly qualified staff in three locations: Warsaw, Olsztyn and Lodz. CSC cooperates with other Citi entities from all over the world.
Currently we provide services to over 60 countries in Europe, Asia, Africa, both Americas and Australia. Our employees use over 24 languages every day. Working in our organization involves working on international projects, in an international and dynamic environment as well as learning the top quality organizational culture.   Candidates interested in this job position are asked to apply by the Citi Careers Apply button below
  Read more about career opportunities at: careeratciti.pl or facebook.com/citigradsemea 

Citi Service Center Poland


 Senior Auditor

Work place: Warszawa
16056096
Description

Function background/context:
Internal Audit is a global organization of over 1400 professionals covering Citi's global businesses and service to clients and customers in over 180 countries. Citi's Internal Audit division provides independent assessments of the company's governance, risk management and internal control environment for key stakeholders including the Board of Directors, senior management and Citi’s numerous regulators globally. Internal Audit is a change agent within Citi aimed to enhance the control culture of Citigroup worldwide and thereby support senior management decision making around the globe.
Job Purpose:
This role participates in the timely delivery of high quality; value added assurance and audit reports for a portfolio of business activities, which meet the requirements of the Boards of Citigroup and Citibank, their affiliates and of Citi’s respective regulators, globally.
This C12 position will perform audit testing on Securities and Fund Services audits in the EMEA region, with a primary focus on the Funds businesses. This individual will report to the SVP for Fund Fiduciary EMEA. Fund Services offers Fund Administration (Fund Accounting, Transfer Agency, Middle Office Services) and Fund Fiduciary /Depository Bank Services from the United Kingdom (London, Edinburgh and Glasgow), Ireland, Luxembourg, Jersey, Poland, The Netherlands, Hungary and Greece.
Key Responsibilities:
~As a seasoned professional applies solid understanding of internal audit standards, policies, and local regulations to provide timely audit assurance.
~Contributes to the development of audit processes improvements.
~Applies solid understanding of how internal audit collectively integrates with line management and control functions to accomplish the objectives of the function and overall business.
~Performs moderately complex audits related to Securities and Fund Services in accordance with corporate methodologies and professional standards, including drafting of audit reports, presenting issues to the business and discussing practical solutions.
~Completes assigned audits within budgeted timeframes, and budgeted costs.
~Provides coaching to team members in all phases of the audit process.
~Monitors the risk environment and assesses the emerging risks through the Business Monitoring process.
~Recommends appropriate and pragmatic solutions to risk and control issues.
~Applies knowledge of key regulations to influence audit scope.
~Develops effective line management relationships to ensure strong understanding of the business.
~Pro-actively develops automated routines to help focus audit testing.


Qualifications

Qualifications and Competencies
~BS/BA degree or equivalent combination of education/experience.
~Intermediate level experience in a related role with experience in business, functional and people management, with proven abilities in taking responsibility for issuing to stakeholders high quality deliverables according to strict timetables.
~Specific subject matter expertise regarding technology application control disciplines and a solid business understanding of Securities Services products, especially those associated with the Funds business.
~Effective negotiation skills, a proactive and 'no surprises' approach in communicating issues and strength in sustaining independent views.  This individual must be an articulate and effective communicator, both orally and in writing, with an energetic, charismatic and approachable style.
~Strong interpersonal skills for interfacing with all levels of internal and external audit and management.


Please be informed that we will contact selected candidates only.
You are kindly requested to include the following clause in your application: “I hereby give my consent to the processing of my personal data included in my job application for the purpose of the recruitment process and after its completion for the purpose of future recruitments (pursuant to the Personal Data Protection Act as of 29 August 1997, Journal of Laws No. 133, item 883).

3469723555725298851.title: Швея
3469723555725298851.text:
Компания «МИЛАВИЦА», один из крупнейших производителей корсетных изделий в Восточной Европе, в связи с развитием производства создаёт новые рабочие места и приглашает ШВЕЙ на работу в г.Минск.

Обязанности:
~пошив женского белья, корсетных, трикотажных изделий и купальников.

Наши требования:
~желателен опыт работы с трикотажем,
~знание швейного оборудования,
~хорошее зрение,
~развитая мелкая моторика рук, подвижность пальцев, умение работать с мелкими деталями (увлечение шитьём, вышиванием, вязанием, лепкой, мозаикой или другими видами рукоделия)
~готовность к высокой интенсивности труда, освоению нового ассортимента и оборудования.

Условия:
~комфортные и современно оборудованные рабочие места,
~оплата сдельно-премиальная (средняя зарплата швей более 600 рублей),
~при отсутствии профессии предлагаем обучение 3 мес. с выплатой ученических 240 руб. + оплата за сделанную работу,
~для новых швей устанавливаем доплаты за освоение ассортимента в течение первого года работы,
~иногородним предоставляем общежитие,
~предоставляем социальные льготы и гарантии в соответствии с коллективным договором (материальная помощь к отпуску, на строительство жилья, к юбилейным и другим личным датам, путевки на оздоровление детей, детские новогодние подарки, бесплатные занятия по фитнесу, корпоративные мероприятия и др.)
~график работы сменный по неделям (6.45-15.05, 15.10-23.30), сб., вс. – выходные.
~приглашаем посмотреть условия работы по адресу ул.Нововиленская, г.Минск.
