-274504776272099601.title: Functional Business Analyst - Travel Sector
-274504776272099601.text:
Functional Business Analyst – Travel Sector
Location: Warszawa

Kamil from Lublin
Tasks
Functional Business
~Provide functional support and problem resolution to sales and/or customer functional staff
~Recommends process, product and/or service improvements based on understanding and anticipation of internal and external business challenges
~Autonomously solves unique and complex problems that have a broad impact in the business
~Work independently and has significant latitude to solve problems
~Maintain or create documentation reflecting all functionalities delivered throughout bespoke solutions in order to facilitate the reusability
~Analyze customer systems and service requirements
~Suggest alternatives / improvements / new techniques in processes, flows, operational models and plans
~Write functional specifications used for customization and/or verify that specifications reflect customer requirements
~Guarantee that customized products/solutions meet specified requirements
~Perform the necessary tests on the customized solution before it is delivered to the customer
~Deliver customer training on the solution when necessary

Project Coordination
~Establish and manage the product/solution integration schedule and SECO roadmap
~Create and execute project work plans and revise as appropriate to meet changing needs and requirements
~Manage the day-to-day operational aspects of the project
~Ensure management of project controls like risks, issues and dependencies
~Review project deliverables and ensure they are of the appropriate level of quality, on time and within budget in accordance with the project plan
~Communication with stakeholders both internal and external


Required profile
~At least 5 years of relevant experience as Business/Functional Analyst (preferable in Travel/Tourism sector)
~Ability to write the documentation that describes what the customer expects of an engineering system. The documentation typically describes what is needed by the system user as well as requested properties of inputs and outputs. Includes: specifications, user guides, High Level Design documents, interfaces documentation.
~Ability to test new functionalities (CR implementation validation) or fixes (PTR fix validation)
~The capacity to use a defined methodology, with a set of steps including: assessment of a process to identify gaps between current performance and goal performance, identification of how the process inputs affect the process outputs, list and prioritize potential opportunities to improve, and identify sources of variation. Ability to analyze data to understand the data collected
~The competences to document, analyze, trace, prioritize and agree on requirements and then control change and communicate to relevant stakeholders
~Ability to use a methodical step-by-step approach to break down complex problems or processes into their constituents parts, identify causes and effects patterns and analyze problems to arrive to an appropriate solution
~Ability to develop new customer value through solutions, processes that meet new needs or existing customer/market needs in new ways
~Very good knowledge of English


We offer
~Interesting projects focused on new technologies and realized within different client’s sectors (banking, telco, pharma)
~Possibility to join the Best Place to Work in IT in Poland, awarded with
~Great Place to Work and Computerworld AudIT prizes 
~Flexible employment forms – B2B and permanent contact
~Package of benefits (Multisport card, privet medical insurance, group insurance, English course) 
~Unique work atmosphere – Check it yourself! – plenty of integration and family-friendly events, hobby groups: sports, board games, photography, billiards


Interested individuals are encouraged to send their resume with reference number to :
rekrutacja-warszawa@pl.sii.eu
together with an approval for the processing of personal data listed below:
„I hereby agree for the processing of my personal data by Sii Sp. z o. o, Al. Niepodległości 69, 02-626 Warszawa, enclosed in the application documents submitted by me, including their processing in the future - for the purpose of the recruitment process. This consent is submitted voluntarily and I declare that I have been informed of the powers I am entitled to in accordance with the Protection of Personal Data Act from August 29, 1997 (consolidated version: Journal of Laws from 2002, No. 101., item 926. with amendments".
Please note that we will contact only selected candidates.

4238103134312563144.title: Solution Specialist
4238103134312563144.text:
Solution Specialist
Place of work: Katowice, Krakow, Opole
About us
Capgemini is one of the world's foremost providers of consulting, technology and outsourcing services.
Capgemini Infrastructure Services is one of the biggest outsourcing service providers in Poland. IS has achieved great success and grown rapidly since the establishment of our first service center in Krakow in 2004. In 2006, we opened a second center in Katowice and in 2012 a third center in Opole. Today, our team of 2,000 professionals delivers IT outsourcing services to 40 clients in 20 languages.

Main accountabilities
• Take part and actively contribute in service solution development, presentation and finally successful contracting of the services
 • Have ownership of and co-ordination for the appropriate IS solution Stream and cost estimation to meet the client stated service requirements and service levels and to ensure an integrated technical solution is built in accordance with service line strategy
 • Determine proposed scope within subject matter experts
 • Participate in meetings with the Client
 • Monitor solution consistency, risks and mitigations, assumptions and issues
 • Provide input to pricing, advise on the pricing model, market standards, sales strategy

Candidate’s profile
• Enthusiasm, fast learning ability and analytical thinking
• Excellent interpersonal skills and good presentation skills
• Stress resistance and ability to work to short deadlines

Requirements
• Minimum 3 years of experience in IT area
 • Fluency in English – excellent both speaking and writing skills; fluency in additional language will be a plus
 • Ability to travel internationally (short term)
 • Working time flexibility - occasionally it may be required to work overtime or extended hours
 • Very good knowledge of MS Office especially MS Excel, MS Word and PowerPoint
 • ITIL Foundation certificate

What we offer
~You will work in multinational, stable company for c.a. 100 Blue Chip Clients - known, global brands, supported by 6000 professionals in 30 languages
~You will gain space to fulfill your ambitions and develop your career, opportunity to take part in transition projects. We operate according to Lean and Kaizen philosophy.
~You will choose your career path (experts or managers) – you will work among professionals (over 900). We will support you to gain knowledge (20 000 online trainings and in class) and get certified (e.g. ITIL, Vmware, Citrix, Oracle Database). You will have the opportunity to take part in coaching programs and develop your knowledge in experts communities.
~You will work in line with high, international work standards and you will have an opportunity to engage in CSR initiatives. 
~You will be appreciated for your results and professionalism – based on clear rules of promotion. Our company applies a wide choice of perks (free private medical care for you and your family, additional life insurance). We help to keep right proportions between your work and private life (Business Parent Program)
~As a disabled person you will get professional support. We are open to provide assistive technologies for people with diverse disabilities. We care about inclusion and equal rights approach. We conduct disability awareness trainings. Join our Win with Capgemini Program for people with disabilities.


Interested candidates are invited to apply online.
Please be advised that Capgemini Poland Sp. z o.o. located in Warsaw, Al. Jerozolimskie 96, is the controller of personal data provided by you in the recruitment applications. Your personal data will be processed in accordance with the Personal Data Protection Act of 29 August 1997 (Journal of Laws2002, No. 101, item. 926 with further amendments) for the purpose of existing and future recruitment processes. Please be advised that in scope of recruitment process your personal data will be processed by the controller and sub-processors located outside European Economic Area including India’s entity. Data submission is voluntary. Every person has the right to access their data in order to correct it or delete it”
 Please include following statement in your application: "I hereby authorize Capgemini Poland Sp. z o.o. to process my personal data included in my job application for existing and future recruitment processes (in accordance with the Personal Data Protection August 1997, Journal of Laws 2002, No. 101, item. 926 with further amendments).I also authorize Capgemini Poland Sp z o.o. to sub-process my personal data outside European Economic Area including India’s entity, which may also include Capgemini’s clients within and outside of EEA."
 We protect your privacy. We kindly inform you that we contact only chosen candidates.The recruitment process is conducted in accordance with the principles of equal treatment in employment, Labor Code, Chapter IIa, Art. 183a– 183e.

-7227221778011802495.title: Derivative Operations Specialist, Associate 1
-7227221778011802495.text:
State Street Corporation: Across the globe, institutional investors rely on us to help them manage risk, respond to challenges, and drive performance and profitability. We keep our clients at the heart of everything we do, and smart, engaged employees are essential to our continued success.
Our promise to maintain an environment where every employee feels valued and able to meet their full potential infuses our company values. It’s also part of our commitment to inclusion, development and engagement, and corporate social responsibility. You’ll have tools to help balance your professional and personal life, paid volunteer days, and access to employee networks that help you stay connected to what matters to you. Join us.
At the moment we are looking for candidates for the position of
 Derivative Operations Specialist, Associate 1 JOB ID:   134486
Location: Gdańsk

to join the insource organization supporting the State Street EMEA
Why State Street Bank Poland?
Operating in Europe since 1970 State Street services clients in multiple locations. State Street Bank Poland was first established in 2007 in Kraków. Today State Street Bank Poland employs over 2500 staff members at three sites across the city and will now open a new office in Gdańsk. This will offer multiple opportunities to gain experience in diverse areas of the investment fund cycle as our Poland branch provides investment fund accounting and related services to clients of multiple State Street locations and business units across Europe. We offer positions in a challenging, rapidly changing and international environment. State Street offers a significant scope for personal growth and career progression. Throughout your career at State Street you will be provided with a wide range of training opportunities and internal mobility options as well as individual development plans, attractive benefits (including Employee Savings Plan) and an excellent remuneration package. The continuous development of our employees from day one is critical as we continually seek to develop and expand the local management team and create future leaders from within.
Job Description:
Purpose Of Role:
The team in Polanddeals with the complex futures and options processing, for the entire European exchange traded derivatives Centre of Excellence book of business and supplementary business offshored from other State Streetsites. The Derivatives Group is the central point of contact for the clearing banks and client service teams on all sites.
Other services provided include some cash instructions and the improvement of processes for recording derivative instruments accurately and efficiently.
Specific Duties:
~Ensure that transactions are processed accurately and on time for our clients’ funds. Ensure that the client instructions are processed and reconciled versus clearing broker statements.
~Point of expertise for complex transaction processing
~Point of contact for any routine queries raised by an internal department
~Daily communication with Investment Manager on outstanding items in conjunction with Team Leader/ members of the corresponding departments / sites.
~Resolution of outstanding issues from other departments, e.g. Fund Accounting, Shareholder Services, Financial Control.
~Be involved in the take on of new business and modeling for new fund structures where appropriate, including requirement to actively participate in meetings
~Assist with internal/external related audit queries
~Introduce and contribute new ideas/procedures to further streamline the operational process
~Ensure that relevant reporting is prepared and reviewed
~Prepare and Maintain Document process flows and procedures
~Review all reporting produced by the Associates on as needed basis.

Qualifications:
Critical Behaviors for Success as defined
Core Competencies
~Ability to work under pressure and to tight deadlines
~Attention to detail crucial
~Skilled communicator, both verbal and written
~Methodical and organized
~Team player
~Ability to work on own initiative
~Good management skills
~Good command of English

Disposition
~Self-motivated
~Enthusiastic
~Self-reliant
~Flexible
~Personable

To apply to this position, follow the "apply now" link. To locate this position in our application page, please use the KEYWORD search functionality and insert either the State Street Job ID or the Location.
As a first step we ask all candidates to fill out our online application form. Please enclose the CV in English and remember to save this document without any Polish characteristics also in file name.
To apply for the position please visit our website 
Job ID: 134486 / Location: Gdańsk


State Street Bank Polska

-7856778230081033751.text:
Citi Service Center (CSC) is an initiative to establish a network of service centers providing high quality services to other entities operating within the Citi Group.
Citi Service Center Poland was founded in 2005, and it currently employs over 3000 highly qualified staff in three locations: Warsaw, Olsztyn and Lodz. CSC cooperates with other Citi entities from all over the world.
Currently we provide services to over 60 countries in Europe, Asia, Africa, both Americas and Australia. Our employees use over 24 languages every day. Working in our organization involves working on international projects, in an international and dynamic environment as well as learning the top quality organizational culture.   Candidates interested in this job position are asked to apply by the Citi Careers Apply button below
  Read more about career opportunities at: careeratciti.pl or facebook.com/citigradsemea 

Citi Service Center Poland


 Volatility Analytics and Trading C# Developer (Analytics)

Work place: Warszawa
16044893
Description

As part of the Citi Equities growth strategy a senior developer is sought to join an existing Volatility Analytics and Trading team in London.  This role sits within the Equity Derivatives Technology department within Markets and Securities Services Technology (MSST).  To ensure business alignment, this function (along with our operations partners) is embedded within the Institutional Clients Group business.
This role will require the candidate to have a strong understanding and solid background in the development of C# applications, services and common middleware. Solid experience of Java is also highly desirable in addition to the mechanics of quality software design, development and testing.
From a business domain perspective, and a firm grasp of equity derivative volatility concepts (Volatility surface management and equity derivative pricing) would be required and while the role is strictly in software development (rather than quantative) we will closely interface with that group.
Qualifications

~Strong knowledge of Equities business derivative domain
~Experienced Developer with more than 5-6 years of experience qualified in many aspects of software applications development including needs assessments, proposals, specifications and development.
~Should be skilled in all aspects of SDLC - both Agile(Scrum) and Waterfall
~SQL, C#, .NET. Java. C desirable
~Database: Oracle and above, SQL (MS and Sybase)
~Development Tools: Visual Studio. Infragistics, DevExpress, SyncFusion, Unix, WPF, WinForms
~Experience of dependency injection and IoC.
~Demonstrates effective analysis and problem solving
~Excellent verbal and written communication skills
~Ability to work with globally distributed teams
~Knowledge of test driven development
~Ability to prioritize work load and meet multiple project deadlines
~Ability to adapt to a dynamic work environment and make independent decisions
~Willingness to work a flexible schedule to accommodate business needs
~Valuing Diversity: Demonstrates an appreciation of a diverse workforce. Appreciates differences in style or perspective and uses differences to add value to decisions or actions and organizational success.


Please be informed that we will contact selected candidates only.
You are kindly requested to include the following clause in your application: “I hereby give my consent to the processing of my personal data included in my job application for the purpose of the recruitment process and after its completion for the purpose of future recruitments (pursuant to the Personal Data Protection Act as of 29 August 1997, Journal of Laws No. 133, item 883).

3405856434444073350.title: работа на дому
3405856434444073350.text: Предлагаю простую и доходную работу на дому без каких-либо вложений. Продавать товары не нужно будет делать, как и раскупать коробки с товарами с их последующей перепродажей также не потребуется. Работа на дому - на сегодня это серьёзный и доходный вид бизнеса со стабильным и ни от кого не зависящим заработком. Вы сами себе начальник и подчинённый. Работая на дому с нами, вы всегда будете зависеть только от себя. Поэтому платить заработок вы будете сами себе – это куда лучше, чем ждать его от работодателя, а он вам никогда хороших денег заработать не даст. Пишите мне на почту, отвечу всем на любые вопросы.

264979737563752638.title: IT Business Analyst
264979737563752638.text:
IT Business Analyst
Location: Wrocław

Kamil from Lublin
Tasks
~Ensuring timely delivery of functional requirements such as elicitation, analysis, documentation and validation
~Turning high level business requirements into technical solutions
~Assuring the validation of solutions by testing, monitoring and configuring existing analytical models
~Maintaining communication across the team and keeping the project on the right course
~Application testing


Required profile
~Minimum 2 years of experience in Business Analysis
~Very good communication skills 
~Excellent English skills
~Experience in cooperation with software development teams 
~Very good analytical and interpersonal skills
~Strong attention to detail
~Nice and open-minded

Nice to have:

~Knowledge of UML and/ or BPMN methodology
~SQL skills
~Experience in Scrum 
~Experience in banking or financial sector


We offer
~Interesting cooperation with specialists from various fields (Web, embedded, mobile)
~A wide variety of training packages: technical trainings, soft skills courses, English/Polish classes
~Access to our technical library, e-learning portals and „knowledge sharing” meetings
~Multilingual, Multicultural creative work environment
~Possibility to design your own career path
~Possibility to develop by switching between preferred projects, technologies and sectors
~Clear and concise feedback system
~An opportunity to work in the company where your opinions are important and taken into account
~Private health care, multisport package and group insurance
~Lots of memorable integration parties for you and your family
~Relocation packages available for those who decide to move and work with us in Wrocław
~Stable employment In the Best place to work in IT In Poland!

Please send your resume with reference number or information about the website you took the advert from


Interested individuals are encouraged to send their resume with reference number to :
rekrutacja-wroclaw@pl.sii.eu
together with an approval for the processing of personal data listed below:
„I hereby agree for the processing of my personal data by Sii Sp. z o. o, Al. Niepodległości 69, 02-626 Warszawa, enclosed in the application documents submitted by me, including their processing in the future - for the purpose of the recruitment process. This consent is submitted voluntarily and I declare that I have been informed of the powers I am entitled to in accordance with the Protection of Personal Data Act from August 29, 1997 (consolidated version: Journal of Laws from 2002, No. 101., item 926. with amendments".
Please note that we will contact only selected candidates.

-1848380727352927765.title: Специалист по постингу. Классное форматирование и постинг в WordPress (удаленно)
-1848380727352927765.title_normalized: специалист по постинг классн форматирован и постинг в wordpress удален
-1848380727352927765.text:
Приветствую! Для англоязычного блога в тематике «собаки» требуется редактор постов. Вам будут предоставлены тексты в Google Doc, вам нужно будет их красиво и правильно оформить на сайте под управлением CMS WordPress (разбить на параграфы, выделить заголовки, добавить фотографии и т.п.). • Таких текстов будет около 5-10 в неделю • В среднем каждый текст состоит из 1000-1500 слов • На 1000 слов уходит примерно 30-45 минут • Оплата 0.2 руб. за слово (или около 270-400 руб в час) Все инструкции (в том числе и видео) будут предоставлены. НЕОБХОДИМЫЕ НАВЫКИ 1. Базовые дизайнерские навыки и чувство прекрасного должны быть развиты. Рисовать вам ничего не потребуется, но вы должны понимать принципы читабельности текста и блог - постов. Уметь делать классное форматирование и верстку текста и элементов дизайна. 2. Базовое знание html/CSS. В основном вам нужно будет работать в WYSIWYG редакторах, но иногда приходится что-то поправить ручками. Вы должны уметь использовать и не бояться всяких там , ,
, ,  и т.п. 3. Техническая подкованность: a. Google Chrome со всевозможными плагинами b. WordPress Wysiwyg редактор c. Работа с Google Docs (google spreadsheets) d. Продвинутое использование ПК и Интернет e. В идеале, вы имеете свой блог или работали на схожей должности с чужим блогом, где успешно применяли необходимые тут навыки 4. Внимательность к деталям и умение следовать инструкциям. Если вы не в состоянии сами проверить свою работу, и после вас нужно будет постоянно перепроверять и править посты, то лучше не откликайтесь. Понятно, что в начале ошибки допустимы, но спустя какое-то время их быть не должно. В ЗАЯВКЕ УКАЖИТЕ: 1. Почему вы считаете, что вы подходите на эту должность. 2. Ссылку на Google Doc с примерами 2х плохих по читабельностиверстке блог-постов и 2х хороших, с разбором причин (что хорошо, что плохо) по пунктам. 3. Ваш возраст 4. Ссылки на профили в соц. сетях (Также, в случае начала сотрудничества, будьте готовы прислать ваш паспорт и подписать соглашение о конфиденциальности). От себя обязуюсь вовремя и в полном объеме проводить оплату любым удобным способом, а также давать детальную обратную связь и помогать/обучать, когда это необходимо. На FL отзывов у меня не много, но у меня Персональный Аттестат (с 2009 года) WebMoney с BL (бизнес уровень) 350+ (кто не в курсе - это значит, что я совершил очень много транзакций на существенные суммы). Спасибо за внимание. Присылайте ваши резюме.

317131469476878284.title: Junior Client Advisor English Speaker
317131469476878284.text:
Junior Client Advisor English Speaker
Place of work: Katowice, Krakow
About us
Capgemini is one of the world's foremost providers of consulting, technology and outsourcing services.
Capgemini Business Services department is one of the first and the biggest outsourcing centers in Poland providing services in 30 different languages in the areas of: finance, accounting, banking, procurement, customer care and marketing services. Business Services employs over 3800 specialists in its offices located in Krakow and Katowice.

Job description
In the role of Junior Client Advisor you will be responsible for delivery of high quality and cost effective customer service to the Client and be the first and key contact for all of our Client's business partners.

Key responsibilities
~Daily contact with the Client and Vendors via phone and email
~Maintaining professional business relations with the Client
~Answering queries and resolving issues effectively
~Effective cooperation with other team members


Ideal candidate profile
~Advanced level of English (C1)
~Customer oriented
~Very good communication skills
~Multitasking and ability to meet deadlines
~Working knowledge of MS Office tools (especially Excel)


What we offer
~Work in multinational company for c.a. 100 Blue Chip Clients- known, global brands, supported by 6000  professionals in 30 languages.
~Clearly defined career path  (experts or managers), wide range of trainings - over 20 000 online trainings and books also available at home, trainings in classroom, funding for learning foreign languages.
~You will learn best practices and global business from Capgemini experts. Over 900 certificated professionals in the field of PMP, SAP, ACCA, etc.
~You will work in an inspiring atmosphere. We work together and celebrate together- Capgemini Theatre, employee volunteer program, integration events, sports events (basketball, volleyball) - everyone will find something for themselves!
~In addition to the salary you will receive attractive benefit package  (medical care for whole family, life insurance), flexible forms of employment  (FLEXI Program). You can recommend friends in Referral Program  and collect awards!
~Our offices are conveniently located with “Bicycle-friendly” certificate!
~As a disabled person you will get professional support. We are open to provide assistive technologies for people with diverse disabilities. We care about inclusion and equal rights approach. We conduct disability awareness trainings. Join our Win with Capgemini Program for people with disabilities.


Interested candidates are invited to apply online.
Please be advised that Capgemini Poland Sp. z o.o. located in Warsaw, Al. Jerozolimskie 96, is the controller of personal data provided by you in the recruitment applications. Your personal data will be processed in accordance with the Personal Data Protection Act of 29 August 1997 (Journal of Laws2002, No. 101, item. 926 with further amendments) for the purpose of existing and future recruitment processes. Please be advised that in scope of recruitment process your personal data will be processed by the controller and sub-processors located outside European Economic Area including India’s entity. Data submission is voluntary. Every person has the right to access their data in order to correct it or delete it”
 Please include following statement in your application: "I hereby authorize Capgemini Poland Sp. z o.o. to process my personal data included in my job application for existing and future recruitment processes (in accordance with the Personal Data Protection August 1997, Journal of Laws 2002, No. 101, item. 926 with further amendments).I also authorize Capgemini Poland Sp z o.o. to sub-process my personal data outside European Economic Area including India’s entity, which may also include Capgemini’s clients within and outside of EEA."
 We protect your privacy. We kindly inform you that we contact only chosen candidates.The recruitment process is conducted in accordance with the principles of equal treatment in employment, Labor Code, Chapter IIa, Art. 183a– 183e.

1688043956346782380.title: BP&A Senior Analyst
1688043956346782380.text:
Citi Service Center (CSC) is an initiative to establish a network of service centers providing high quality services to other entities operating within the Citi Group.
Citi Service Center Poland was founded in 2005, and it currently employs over 3000 highly qualified staff in three locations: Warsaw, Olsztyn and Lodz. CSC cooperates with other Citi entities from all over the world.
Currently we provide services to over 60 countries in Europe, Asia, Africa, both Americas and Australia. Our employees use over 24 languages every day. Working in our organization involves working on international projects, in an international and dynamic environment as well as learning the top quality organizational culture.   Candidates interested in this job position are asked to apply by the Citi Careers Apply button below
  Read more about career opportunities at: careeratciti.pl or facebook.com/citigradsemea 

Citi Service Center Poland


 BP&A Senior Analyst

Work place: Warszawa
16061316
Description

Responsibilities: 
~Provide analysis on the New Products launched by Citi according to the Compliance’s requirements
~Analyze productivity related items which include identifying the cause of case volume increase, root cause of volume changes and formulation of solutions to address issues
~At analysis level, apply rigorous analytical methods to organize, analyze, and interpret data and reports; ensure appropriate methodology is selected to draw conclusions and make recommendations answering specific business needs
~Identify problematic areas and conduct research to determine the best course of action to correct the data
~Analyze reports of data duplicates or other errors to provide ongoing appropriate inter-departmental communication and monthly or daily data reports
~Identify, analyze, and interpret trends or patterns in complex data sets
~Data Reporting
~In collaboration with others, interpret data and develop recommendations based on findings
~Use visualization techniques to display data and the results of analysis in clear straightforward presentations that can be understood by non-technical readers
~Provide written explanations of approach and analysis in plain language that supports the conclusions and observations
~Perform basic statistical analyses for projects and reports
~Create and present quality dashboards
~Generate routine and ad hoc reports
~Drive quality, reliability and usability of all work products
~Evaluate and refine the statistical methods and procedures used to obtain data in order to ensure validity, applicability, efficiency, and accuracy
~Innovate and generate new ideas, concepts and models to improve methods of obtaining and evaluating quantitative and qualitative data
~Think outside the box and look for new methods to constantly improve the effectiveness and efficiency of the AML Detection, Monitoring and Operations systems and processes used in Citi
~Document solutions and present results in a simple comprehensive way to non-technical audience, as well as write more formal documentation using statistical vocabulary
~Maintain an industry leading knowledge of the tools, systems and processes available for best in class AML Detection and Monitoring Operations 


Qualifications

Requirements: 
~Minimum of 4-6 years of relevant experience
~Bachelor’s/Master’s degree in respective field
~Knowledge of statistics, at least to the degree necessary in order to communicate easily with statisticians
~Data analyst background
~Fluent English
~Technical expertise regarding data models, data visualization and database design development.
~Proficiency with Microsoft Suite (Word, Excel, Power Point, Project, and Visio)
~Experience in data mining tools/techniques and procedures and knowing when their use is appropriate
~Minimum of 2-3 years of experience using SAS or other statistical packages is desirable for analyzing large datasets
~Required experience with relational databases such as Oracle, SQL Server and Data Marts/Data Warehouses.
~Ability to present complex information in an understandable and compelling manner
~AML Compliance and Mantas knowledge would be a plus
~Knowledge of the local/regional laws and regulations applicable to anti-money laundering is a plus
~Previous experience with financial services companies is preferred (retail banking, small business banking, commercial, institutional, private banking)


Please be informed that we will contact selected candidates only.
You are kindly requested to include the following clause in your application: “I hereby give my consent to the processing of my personal data included in my job application for the purpose of the recruitment process and after its completion for the purpose of future recruitments (pursuant to the Personal Data Protection Act as of 29 August 1997, Journal of Laws No. 133, item 883).

3748015068851029440.title: Credit and Collections Analyst with Italian
3748015068851029440.text:
Credit and Collections Analyst with Italian
Place of work: Krakow
About us
Capgemini is one of the world's foremost providers of consulting, technology and outsourcing services.
Capgemini Business Services department is one of the first and the biggest outsourcing centers in Poland providing services in 30 different languages in the areas of: finance, accounting, banking, procurement, customer care and marketing services. Business Services employs over 3800 specialists in its offices located in Krakow and Katowice.

Key responsibilities
~Managing portfolio of Italian-speaking Customers
~Achieving cash collection targets
~Maintaining a professional relation with the Clients
~Maximizing the amount of closed requests in the area of cash collection
~Performing account reconciliations and preparing reports
~Coordinating the financial documents flow


Ideal candidate profile
~At least intermediate level of English (min. B1)
~At least upper intermediate of Italian(min. B2)
~Focus on details
~Client-focused attitude
~Multitasking and ability to meet deadlines
~Working knowledge of MS Office tools (especially Excel)


What we offer
~Work in multinational company for c.a. 100 Blue Chip Clients- known, global brands, supported by 6000  professionals in 30 languages.
~Clearly defined career path(experts or managers), wide range of trainings - over 20 000 online trainings and books also available at home, trainings in classroom, funding for learning foreign languages.
~You will learn best practices and global business from Capgemini experts. Over 900 certificated professionals in the field of PMP, SAP, ACCA, etc.
~You will work in an inspiring atmosphere. We work together and celebrate together- Capgemini Theatre, employee volunteer program, integration events, sports events (basketball, volleyball) - everyone will find something for themselves!
~In addition to the salary you will receive attractive benefit package  (medical care for whole family, life insurance). You can recommend friends in Referral Program  and collect awards!
~Our offices are conveniently located with “Bicycle-friendly” certificate!
~As a disabled person you will get professional support. We are open to provide assistive technologies for people with diverse disabilities. We care about inclusion and equal rights approach. We conduct disability awareness trainings. Join our Win with Capgemini Program for people with disabilities.


Interested candidates are invited to apply online.
Please be advised that Capgemini Poland Sp. z o.o. located in Warsaw, Al. Jerozolimskie 96, is the controller of personal data provided by you in the recruitment applications. Your personal data will be processed in accordance with the Personal Data Protection Act of 29 August 1997 (Journal of Laws2002, No. 101, item. 926 with further amendments) for the purpose of existing and future recruitment processes. Please be advised that in scope of recruitment process your personal data will be processed by the controller and sub-processors located outside European Economic Area including India’s entity. Data submission is voluntary. Every person has the right to access their data in order to correct it or delete it”
 Please include following statement in your application: "I hereby authorize Capgemini Poland Sp. z o.o. to process my personal data included in my job application for existing and future recruitment processes (in accordance with the Personal Data Protection August 1997, Journal of Laws 2002, No. 101, item. 926 with further amendments).I also authorize Capgemini Poland Sp z o.o. to sub-process my personal data outside European Economic Area including India’s entity, which may also include Capgemini’s clients within and outside of EEA."
 We protect your privacy. We kindly inform you that we contact only chosen candidates.The recruitment process is conducted in accordance with the principles of equal treatment in employment, Labor Code, Chapter IIa, Art. 183a– 183e.

-2489089658008406656.title_normalized: измен программ для поднят объявлен сдела на делф удален
-2489089658008406656.text:
Необходимо изменить программу для поднятия объявлений для сайта barahla.net 
Дело в том что на сайте внести изменения, а именно перенесли кнопку "обновить дату объявления". Раньше она была рядом с каждым объявлением, а теперь приходится открывать конкретное объявление которое над поднять и уже там кнопка обновить дату. После этих изменений программа перестала поднимать объявления. Исходный код программы есть. Программа создана на делфи. Интересует стоимость такой работы

Junior HR Administrator French Speaker
Place of work: Krakow
About us
Capgemini is one of the world's foremost providers of consulting, technology and outsourcing services.
Capgemini Business Services department is one of the first and the biggest outsourcing centers in Poland providing services in 30 different languages in the areas of: finance, accounting, banking, procurement, customer care and marketing services. Business Services employs over 3800 specialists in its offices located in Krakow and Katowice.Currently we are looking for a young, ambitious person ready to start the career in Human Resources department on the position of Junior HR Specialist. If you are interested in providing services in HR area with the highest quality in an international project – send your CV and start the adventure with us!

As a Junior HR Specialist position will be responsible for
~Interacting with the Client on a daily basis via phone and email
~Processing HR Administration or Payroll & Benefits related requests
~Correct and timely HR data processing
~Providing clarification of HR policies and procedures
~Maintaining the employee lifecycle from hire to retire
~Updating all required process documentation (process maps and procedures)


Candidate’s profile
~Bachelor degree
~Fluent French and fluent English are required
~Good communication skills
~Client-focused attitude
~Attention to details
~Good knowledge of MS Office
~Ability to cooperate smoothly with other team members in a dynamic environment


What we offer
~Work in multinational company for c.a. 100 Blue Chip Clients - known, global brands, supported by 6000  professionals in 30 languages.
~Clearly defined career path (experts or managers), wide range of trainings - over 20 000 online trainings and books also available at home, trainings in classroom, funding for learning foreign languages.
~You will learn best practices and global business from Capgemini experts. Over 900 certificated professionals  in the field of PMP, SAP, ACCA, etc.
~You will work in an inspiring atmosphere. We work together and celebrate together - Capgemini Theatre, employee volunteer program, integration events, sports events (basketball, volleyball) - everyone will find something for themselves!
~In addition to the salary you will receive attractive benefit package (medical care for whole family, life insurance). You can recommend friends in Referral Program  and collect awards!
~Our offices are conveniently located with “Bicycle-friendly” certificate!
~As a disabled person you will get professional support. We are open to provide assistive technologies for people with diverse disabilities. We care about inclusion and equal rights approach. We conduct disability awareness trainings. Join our Win with Capgemini Program for people with disabilities.

-2198678958549863130.title: Controllership Transformation Director
-2198678958549863130.text:
Controllership Transformation Director
Location: Wrocław
Description
Roles and Responsibilities
Lead the transformation execution of the EMEA plans, provide continues update to senior Management including Corporate Controller, Head of LTS and Global/Region Controllership, Region leaders and Country Managing Directors
Coordinate and organize work with Multiple COEs (Bangalore, Guadalajara and Wroclaw) 
Dual reporting to Global Region Controller and Local Tax and Statutory Controller.
Oversight the transformation of the following End to end process within EMEA Region:
~US GAAP Legal Entity Accounting
~US GAAP Tax Provision
~Statutory Financial Statements
~Local and Global Tax Filings
~Local Country Audit and Compliance Support
~Tax Planning Support and Implementation.
~Statutory Representation
~Balance Sheet Review and Support Country Financial Reviews
~Others that may apply to specific countries

Specific Roles and Responsibilities
~Accountable for leading the transformation of the delivery model in a number of countries within the EMEA region while providing leadership to a number of Mgrs. and individual contributors within the LTS organization in region.
~Manages the relationship with country Managing Directors for countries under scope, and provide periodic cadence in managing Statutory and Fiduciary obligation.
~Consults with business leaders at the Executive level as needed to drive and influence strategic decision-making within a broad scope (e.g., balancing risk, approving significant deals).
~Leads process improvement and policy development initiatives that impact the Controllership function.
~Oversees the key controls within one or more domains of responsibility to ensure compliance with legal and accounting requirements (e.g., GAAP, SBC, AFM).
~Manages large external vendor relationships (e.g., auditors) as needed.
~Ensures that the financial strategies and initiatives within area of accountability are integrated with Controllership strategies.

Knowledge and Skills Required:
~Strong Project Management Experience, with previous major experience within the Finance Function involving the whole EMEA Region, local legal compliance experience roles, audit or similar are preferred.
~Ability to operate in a matrixed environment and deal with ambiguity.
~Superior understanding of US GAAP, IFRS and Local GAAP in Europe and Reporting requirements.
~Superior analytical skills.
~Excellent people management skills.
~Building trusted relationship and a strong collaboration.
~Able to create a vision and the ability to execute the vision and provide the systemic infrastructure to achieve the vision.
~Proven experience managing multiple countries and remote employees
~Excellent communication skill, catered to a wide variety of audiences.
~Strong business acumen.
~Excellent consulting, influencing, and negotiation skills.
~Excellent multi-tasking and prioritization skills.

Education and Experience Required
~First level university degree in Accounting or Professional Accounting Qualification (ACCA / CPA/ ACA ) and a MBA degree from a recognized university is preferred.
~Typically, 12+ years of experience in a finance function or exhibiting an exceptionally strong background in some other relevant and applicable area of business.
~Typically, five to Eight years of people management experience at a senior level.

Knowledge and Skills:
~Superior ability to provide finance consultation to senior managers within area of expertise.
~Superior understanding of accounting principles and financial analysis.
~Excellent project management and prioritization skills.
~Excellent people management skills, including managing teams across geographies.
~Ability to build partnerships across functions.
~Excellent communication skills catered to a wide variety of audiences.
~Strong leadership and staff development skills.
~Excellent consulting, influence, and negotiation skills.

We are offering

~Working in an international company
~Opportunity to develop career path in organizational structures
~Flexible time schedule
~Modern and friendly work environment with open door policy
~Professional trainings
~Social benefits
~Competitive salary and flexible working hours
~Private medical care
~Benefit sport system
~Life insurance
~Extend Wellness Program


Make it happen today! Apply at hp.com/jobs

Make sure you insert the following statement along with your CV:
I hereby authorize you to process my personal data included in my
job application for the needs of the recruitment process (in accordance
with the Personnel Protection Act of 29.08.1997 no 133 position 883).

1015374766125708102.title: Danish Customer Service Representative
1015374766125708102.text:
Danish Customer Service Representative
Location: Warszawa
Are you passionate about delivering world-class customer service?

Do you want to be ambassador for a globally recognized high quality brand?

Global shoe- and accessories brand Ecco is establishing a new customer service center in Warsaw to assist its European online customers. Ecco has high ambitions for future growth within e-commerce, and we need your help. We are looking to recruit experienced customer service representatives with great communication skills, who have a positive mindset and are/ will be passionate about Ecco’s products.

You will represent ECCO to the outside world, and must build the company’s image together with your team, by providing unique customer experiences.

Duties include:
~Assisting customers with their inquiries regarding Ecco products, orders, payments, returns, claims and shipment
~Educating and updating yourself with deep knowledge about the company and products
~Taking part in training in customer service processes and best practices


Skills and Experience:
~Good interpersonal skills and ability to work as a team
~Excellent communication skills both written and spoken
~Strong customer driven focus
~Experience with customer service (phone, email, chat etc.) is an advantage

Experience in using ERP and CRM – within Microsoft AX and Dynamics CRM is an advantage
Language requirements:
~English, at least fluent is required
~Native or at least fluent: Danish
~Polish will be advantage


We offer:
~The chance to grow your career in an international company with a globally recognized brand
~A motivated environment created by passionate colleagues and owners
~Attractive offices in Warsaw
~Salary package: Competitive, based on capabilities

Start time: As soon as possible
Contract: Full or part time


Please send your application via "Aplikuj" button:

 IN THE TITLE PLEASE ADD THE NAME OF THE POSITION YOU ARE APPLYING FOR
We will reply only to selected candidates

-8051948802502775865.title: Transaction Svs Analyst 2
-8051948802502775865.text:
Citi Service Center (CSC) is an initiative to establish a network of service centers providing high quality services to other entities operating within the Citi Group.
Citi Service Center Poland was founded in 2005, and it currently employs over 3000 highly qualified staff in three locations: Warsaw, Olsztyn and Lodz. CSC cooperates with other Citi entities from all over the world.
Currently we provide services to over 60 countries in Europe, Asia, Africa, both Americas and Australia. Our employees use over 24 languages every day. Working in our organization involves working on international projects, in an international and dynamic environment as well as learning the top quality organizational culture.   Candidates interested in this job position are asked to apply by the Citi Careers Apply button below
  Read more about career opportunities at: careeratciti.pl or facebook.com/citigradsemea 

Citi Service Center Poland


 Transaction Svs Analyst 2

Work place: Warszawa, Łódź, Olsztyn
16079777
Description

The person in this position takes care of all problems occurring from the time of the input of a transaction until the settlement is completed. Timely updating of the pending records as well as maintaining audit trails for all follow-ups done on problem cases is a very important part of this function. Immediate follow-ups on failed trades are crucial to the success of our business. The independent work requires a responsible and persistent character.
Key Task:
~Trade processing and settlement
~Failed and unmatched trades monitoring, follow-up, resolution
~Inquiry and problem resolution
~Preparation of reversals / corrections
~Control on future trades that have already been booked (pre-matching)
~Follow-up on discrepancies/problems detected at this stage
~Solving of reconcilement issues
~Funding
~External and internal transfers processing
~Handle interest claims
~Process reversals / corrections requested by RM’s
~Check & reconciliation of items under your name assigned by the reconcilement dept
~Static data maintenance 

Qualifications

~Good knowledge of securities administration and clearing for International Markets
~Good understanding of various instruments of a capital market
~Very good command of English
~PC literacy, mainly MS Excel
~Ability to effectively work on telephone/email with various parties
~Economy and business administration background preferred
~Job experience from areas like custody, investment funds, securities, brokerage and similar
~Sense of urgency, quick in action
~Exact, accurate
~Flexible, able to spot irregularity and react promptly and adequately
~Persistent, ready to actively follow up and escalate if needed
~Well organized, working to tight deadlines
~Sense for independent work and good team player
~Reliable


Please be informed that we will contact selected candidates only.
You are kindly requested to include the following clause in your application: “I hereby give my consent to the processing of my personal data included in my job application for the purpose of the recruitment process and after its completion for the purpose of future recruitments (pursuant to the Personal Data Protection Act as of 29 August 1997, Journal of Laws No. 133, item 883).

-7120130761342845316.title: Risk Systems Strategy & Governance Analyst
-7120130761342845316.text:
Citi Service Center (CSC) is an initiative to establish a network of service centers providing high quality services to other entities operating within the Citi Group.
Citi Service Center Poland was founded in 2005, and it currently employs over 3000 highly qualified staff in three locations: Warsaw, Olsztyn and Lodz. CSC cooperates with other Citi entities from all over the world.
Currently we provide services to over 60 countries in Europe, Asia, Africa, both Americas and Australia. Our employees use over 24 languages every day. Working in our organization involves working on international projects, in an international and dynamic environment as well as learning the top quality organizational culture.   Candidates interested in this job position are asked to apply by the Citi Careers Apply button below
  Read more about career opportunities at: careeratciti.pl or facebook.com/citigradsemea 

Citi Service Center Poland


 Risk Systems Strategy & Governance Analyst

Work place: Warszawa
16058122
Description

The job requirement is to assist in the delivery of multiple monitoring-centric analyses and projects for Wholesale Risk Management.
The Business Analyst should:
~Possess a functional level of the concept of exceptions and limits and their associated monitoring process as they pertain to credit and market risk.
~Develop an advanced level of understanding of Citi’s Credit Management Policy and the role that limit and exception monitoring plays in the Risk Management process.
~Work with Franchise Risk Architecture, Risk Technology, Wholesale Risk Management for the Institutional Client Group, Portfolio Monitoring Group, and Operations to provide current status of multiple projects in their progress through established milestones.
~Mediate with Risk, Technology, and other Risk Architecture colleagues to clarify requirements and gap analysis in monitoring processes, the reporting of these monitoring processes, and individual business standards in line with Policy.
~Communicate progress, issues, and findings with key stakeholders in regular meetings.
~Participate in and provide guidance for User Acceptance Testing of new Monitoring functionality within Risk systems
~Work autonomously, providing guidance and support to other Franchise Risk Architecture groups, Risk Management, and Risk Technology.
~As a senior professional, act as a broad resource to Franchise Risk Architecture’s Post-Approval Credit Monitoring team, looking beyond specifics job tasks, taking initiatives, raising issues, and finding implementation solutions.
~In your understanding of the Credit Management Policy requirements for Limit and Exception Monitoring, creatively propose alternate and more efficient ways of operating, and interact with Technology to ensure delivery of a sound product within the required timeline.
~Responsible for ensuring that the Risk Management business has the right technical tools to support the required monitoring, reporting, and functionality processes and that all the systems are compliant with the relevant Risk Management policies.
~Create and execute project work plans, revising as appropriate to meet changing needs and requirements in the changing L&E Monitoring domain

Qualifications

The successful candidate should have:
~At least  3-5 years of Risk/Banking experience or similar
~Broad understanding of Classifiable and Delinquency Managed credit and operational policies and procedures, including an excellent command on the limit and exception process.
~Prior experience in maintaining project management and its associated reporting
~Broad understanding of credit source systems, reporting systems, and end reporting/warehousing.
~Sound knowledge of monitoring processes and roles and responsibilities of participants in the risk processes.
~Solid understanding of credit policy
~Should have professional written and verbal communication and interpersonal skills
~Excellent analytical, conceptual, communication and interpersonal skills.
~The ability to think creatively, maintain and improve sound business processes while working in a dynamic, cross-cultural team environment.
~The ability to work independently, handle multiple tasks simultaneously and effectively take on leadership roles in various areas.
~Proven  track record in thriving in rapidly changing environments, flexible mindset, ability to place substance over form, and work with complex systems with lots of integration points and keeping a mindful of all ends.

Skills:
~Strong organizational, time management (prioritization of tasks)
~Attention to detail
~Strong customer focus
~Should have excellent knowledge of and ability in Microsoft Excel, Visio, and PowerPoint


Please be informed that we will contact selected candidates only.
You are kindly requested to include the following clause in your application: “I hereby give my consent to the processing of my personal data included in my job application for the purpose of the recruitment process and after its completion for the purpose of future recruitments (pursuant to the Personal Data Protection Act as of 29 August 1997, Journal of Laws No. 133, item 883).

-8040180850285767253.text:
Движок магазина OpenCart, уже развернут админами.

Требуется полностью подготовить магазин к работе за исключением наполнением всего ассортимента, а именно:
- внести все телефоны, адреса, и прочие реквизиты магазина
- создать две категории для товара и добавить в каждую 2 товара 
- для того контента, который не изменяется из админки, надо составить замечания по доработке контента к верстальщикам и программистам

Информации готовой нет, надо будет общаться по вацапу с директором магазина и спрашивать что необходимо. 
Приблизительный бюджет я указал, но Вы можете составить свою смету в разбивке по задачам.

Сайт магазина можно посмотреть тут:

-1983125666787102173.title: Controllership Accountant
-1983125666787102173.text:
Controllership Accountant
Place of work: Katowice
About us
Capgemini is one of the world's foremost providers of consulting, technology and outsourcing services.
Capgemini Business Services department is one of the first and the biggest outsourcing centers in Poland providing services in 30 different languages in the areas of: finance, accounting, banking, procurement, customer care and marketing services. Business Services employs over 3800 specialists in its offices located in Krakow and Katowice.

Position purpose
We are looking for a candidate who is ready to be a part of Katowice Delivery Team – Controllership scope.
 As a member of this team you will be responsible for high end accounting services and you will work with fully independent team of experts. You will be responsible for company financial data and its accuracy.

Job description
~Payroll postings
~Company level CoA maintenance
~Fixed Assets creation, capitalization, sale
~Reconciliations preparation and approval
~VAT reporting
~HFM reporting
~Internal controls preparation and approval
~Financial Statement final sign off based on IFRS guidelines
~Work closely with the Client and maintain good working relationship
~Identifying potential process improvements


Candidate’s profile
~At least 1 year of experience in GA is required
~Accounting/financial degree or accounting qualifications
~Good accounting skills (IFRS knowledge would be an asset)
~SAP knowledge is required
~Good knowledge of English language (B2 minimum)
~Very good knowledge of MS Excel
~Continuous learning and self development
~Very good analytical skills
~Good Customer Service skills and client-focus attitude
~Flexibility, ability to deal with ambiguity and change, and time pressure


What we offer
~Extending accounting/IFRS knowledge (by on-the-job practice as well as professional trainings)
~Direct interactions with operational team of international client
~Possibility to get to know advanced, complex and not standardized and complex processes
~Playing responsible role within interesting CG Service Line – Controllership
~Opportunity to build business relationships at all levels of the client’s company
~Ability to develop linguistic skills
~Great atmosphere within the team

Additionaly:
~You will work in multinational, stable company for c.a. 100 Blue Chip Clients - known, global brands, supported by 6000  professionals in 30 languages.
~You will gain space to fulfill your ambitions and develop your career, opportunity to take part in transition projects. We operate according to Lean and Kaizen philosophy.
~You will choose your career path (experts or managers) – you will work among professionals (over 900). We will support you to gain knowledge (20 000 online trainings and in class) and get certified (e.g. ACCA, Prince2, PMP). You will have the opportunity to take part in coaching programs and develop your knowledge in experts communities.
~You will work in line with high, international work standards and you will have an opportunity to engage in CSR initiatives.
~You will be appreciated for your results and professionalism – based on clear rules of promotion. Our company applies a wide choice of perks (free private medical care for you and your family, additional life insurance). We help to keep right proportions between your work and private life (Business Parent Program).
~As a disabled person you will get professional support. We are open to provide assistive technologies for people with diverse disabilities. We care about inclusion and equal rights approach. We conduct disability awareness trainings. Join our Win with Capgemini Program for people with disabilities.


Interested candidates are invited to apply online.
Please be advised that Capgemini Poland Sp. z o.o. located in Warsaw, Al. Jerozolimskie 96, is the controller of personal data provided by you in the recruitment applications. Your personal data will be processed in accordance with the Personal Data Protection Act of 29 August 1997 (Journal of Laws2002, No. 101, item. 926 with further amendments) for the purpose of existing and future recruitment processes. Please be advised that in scope of recruitment process your personal data will be processed by the controller and sub-processors located outside European Economic Area including India’s entity. Data submission is voluntary. Every person has the right to access their data in order to correct it or delete it”
 Please include following statement in your application: "I hereby authorize Capgemini Poland Sp. z o.o. to process my personal data included in my job application for existing and future recruitment processes (in accordance with the Personal Data Protection August 1997, Journal of Laws 2002, No. 101, item. 926 with further amendments).I also authorize Capgemini Poland Sp z o.o. to sub-process my personal data outside European Economic Area including India’s entity, which may also include Capgemini’s clients within and outside of EEA."
 We protect your privacy. We kindly inform you that we contact only chosen candidates.The recruitment process is conducted in accordance with the principles of equal treatment in employment, Labor Code, Chapter IIa, Art. 183a– 183e.

 Условия: 
- Иногородним предоставляется жилье. Графики работы оговариваются с каждым индивидуально. Возможны подработки для студентов. 
- Мы предлагаем работу вахтой на крупных складах Минска. 
- Возможно оформление семейных пар. 
- Срок вахты: 10/10, 20/10 рабочих дней. 
- Также есть графики 2/2, 5/2, 1/3. 
- Бесплатное общежитие с хорошими условиями. 
- Наличие питания в зависимости от места работы. 
- Спец. одежда от компании

1438702443718634365.title: Major Incident Manager
1438702443718634365.text:
Major Incident Manager
Place of work: Katowice, Krakow, Opole
About us
Capgemini is one of the world's foremost providers of consulting, technology and outsourcing services.
Cloud Infrastructure Services is one of the biggest outsourcing service providers in Poland. Since the establishment of our first service center in Krakow in 2004, it has achieved great success and grown rapidly. In 2006, we opened a second center in Katowice and in 2012 a third center in Opole. Today, our team of 2,000 professionals delivers IT outsourcing services to 40 clients in 20 languages.

If you are:
~Natural-born leader
~Self-confident and assertive
~Goal, action and detail oriented
~Stress-resistant and keen to take challenges
~Responsible and well organised


If you can:
~Influence others and effectively negotiate
~Take quick decisions
~Efficiently prioritize tasks and manage your time
~Communicate effectively
~Act assertively and deliver quick results
~Delegate and execute timely delivery of tasks
~Communicate fluently in English


If you are eager to take responsibility over:
~Managing activities of IT support groups restoring IT and business services minimizing service disruption times
~Establishing and adhering to procedures
~Chairing meetings and conference calls
~Efficient communication with the client, support teams and end users
~Escalating to high-level management
~Ensuring that actions are completely and transparently documented

Then you should apply and join our team now.

What we offer:
You will work in multinational, stable company for c.a. 100 Blue Chip Clients - known, global brands, supported by 6000 professionals in 30 languages
You will gain space to fulfill your ambitions and develop your career, opportunity to take part in transition projects. We operate according to Lean and Kaizen philosophy.
You will choose your career path (experts or managers) – you will work among professionals (over 900). We will support you to gain knowledge (20 000 online trainings and in class) and get certified (e.g. ITIL, Vmware, Citrix, Oracle Database). You will have the opportunity to take part in coaching You will work in line with high, international work standards and you will have an opportunity to engage in CSR initiatives. 
You will be appreciated for your results and professionalism – based on clear rules of promotion. Our company applies a wide choice of perks (free private medical care for you and your family, additional life insurance). We help to keep right proportions between your work and private life (Business Parent Program)

Interested candidates are invited to apply online.
Please be advised that Capgemini Poland Sp. z o.o. located in Warsaw, Al. Jerozolimskie 96, is the controller of personal data provided by you in the recruitment applications. Your personal data will be processed in accordance with the Personal Data Protection Act of 29 August 1997 (Journal of Laws2002, No. 101, item. 926 with further amendments) for the purpose of existing and future recruitment processes. Please be advised that in scope of recruitment process your personal data will be processed by the controller and sub-processors located outside European Economic Area including India’s entity. Data submission is voluntary. Every person has the right to access their data in order to correct it or delete it”
 Please include following statement in your application: "I hereby authorize Capgemini Poland Sp. z o.o. to process my personal data included in my job application for existing and future recruitment processes (in accordance with the Personal Data Protection August 1997, Journal of Laws 2002, No. 101, item. 926 with further amendments).I also authorize Capgemini Poland Sp z o.o. to sub-process my personal data outside European Economic Area including India’s entity, which may also include Capgemini’s clients within and outside of EEA."
 We protect your privacy. We kindly inform you that we contact only chosen candidates.The recruitment process is conducted in accordance with the principles of equal treatment in employment, Labor Code, Chapter IIa, Art. 183a– 183e.

3377985387779426263.title: AML QA Ops Intermediate Analyst
3377985387779426263.text:
Citi Service Center (CSC) is an initiative to establish a network of service centers providing high quality services to other entities operating within the Citi Group.
Citi Service Center Poland was founded in 2005, and it currently employs over 3000 highly qualified staff in three locations: Warsaw, Olsztyn and Lodz. CSC cooperates with other Citi entities from all over the world.
Currently we provide services to over 60 countries in Europe, Asia, Africa, both Americas and Australia. Our employees use over 24 languages every day. Working in our organization involves working on international projects, in an international and dynamic environment as well as learning the top quality organizational culture.   Candidates interested in this job position are asked to apply by the Citi Careers Apply button below
  Read more about career opportunities at: careeratciti.pl or facebook.com/citigradsemea 

Citi Service Center Poland


 AML QA Ops Intermediate Analyst

Work place: Warszawa
16079202
Description

Job summary:
Reviewing of transaction monitoring alerts closed by AML Ops Analyst to ensure that quality of review is within the required global QA standards.
Responsibilities:
~Provide feedback to AML Ops team and work on standardization of alert monitoring process across the Hub
~Prepare and validate QA reviewer reports
~Adherence to global standard policies and procedures. Use and incorporate global standard tools and procedures
~Operate within agreed business SLAs and confidentiality standards
~Build and applying knowledge of money laundering processes
~Provide after-review best practices feedback to the Hub
~Internal trainer
~Participation in initiatives and projects to develop current standards, trainings, processes and systems


Qualifications

Requirements:
~2 years of AML Experience, experience as Senior Analyst role with successful track records
~Subject matter expert in AML regulations, systems and reports
~Proficient in Windows applications (Word, Excel, Outlook, etc)
~Possess business knowledge of GTS business and its products
~Computer Literacy
~Recorded high performance in quality and quantity
~Analytical thinking
~Organized, disciplined and highly responsible
~Demonstrated initiative and creativity in problem solving
~Demonstrated ability to work independently, interact effectively with different levels of management
~Participation and leading initiatives and/or projects
~High performance ratings
~Excellent communication skills
~Fluent knowledge of English


Please be informed that we will contact selected candidates only.
You are kindly requested to include the following clause in your application: “I hereby give my consent to the processing of my personal data included in my job application for the purpose of the recruitment process and after its completion for the purpose of future recruitments (pursuant to the Personal Data Protection Act as of 29 August 1997, Journal of Laws No. 133, item 883).

753879764380003051.title: Financial Services Specialist with French
753879764380003051.text:
Financial Services Specialist with French
Place of work: Katowice
About us
Capgemini is one of the world's foremost providers of consulting, technology and outsourcing services.
Capgemini Business Services department is one of the first and the biggest outsourcing centers in Poland providing services in 30 different languages in the areas of: finance, accounting, banking, procurement, customer care and marketing services. Business Services employs over 3800 specialists in its offices located in Krakow and Katowice.

Position purpose
Due to establishing a new project in Katowice we are looking for people willing to join a team providing services within insurance scope for our French Client.

Key responsibilities
~Interacting with Client's third parties (agents and brokers) via phone and email
~Applying changes in insurance policies according to Client’s requests
~Creating ad hoc reports for Client
~Delivering a high quality, professional and proactive day to day service to Client within agreed SLA
~Focusing on continuously developing business relationships
~Helping the team to improve efficiency


Ideal candidate profile
~At least upper intermediate of French and English (min. B2)
~At least one year of relevant experience in delivering finance and analytical processes
~Working knowledge of MS Office tools (especially Excel)
~Very good analytical skills and attention to details
~Multitasking and ability to meet deadlines
~Good communication skills


What we offer
~Work in multinational company for c.a. 100 Blue Chip Clients  - known, global brands, supported by 6000  professionals in 30 languages.
~Clearly defined career path  (experts or managers), wide range of trainings - over 20 000 online trainings and books also available at home, trainings in classroom, funding for learning foreign languages.
~You will learn best practices and global business from Capgemini experts. Over 900 certificated professionals in the field of PMP, SAP, ACCA, etc.
~You will work in an inspiring atmosphere. We work together and celebrate together- Capgemini Theatre, employee volunteer program, integration events, sports events (basketball, volleyball) - everyone will find something for themselves!
~In addition to the salary you will receive attractive benefit package  (medical care for whole family, life insurance). You can recommend friends in Referral Program  and collect awards!
~Our offices are conveniently located with “Bicycle-friendly” certificate!
~As a disabled person you will get professional support. We are open to provide assistive technologies for people with diverse disabilities. We care about inclusion and equal rights approach. We conduct disability awareness trainings. Join our Win with Capgemini Program for people with disabilities.


Interested candidates are invited to apply online.
Please be advised that Capgemini Poland Sp. z o.o. located in Warsaw, Al. Jerozolimskie 96, is the controller of personal data provided by you in the recruitment applications. Please be advised that in scope of recruitment process your personal data will be processed by the controller and sub-processors located outside European Economic Area including India’s entity. Data submission is voluntary. Every person has the right to access their data in order to correct it or delete it”

-8563372925667171119.title: Маркетолог
-8563372925667171119.text:
Наш объем задач (осторожно, очень много букв!):
~Написание текстов для внешних ресурсов и для сайтов компании: релизы, аналитические статьи, рекламные тексты. Умеете писать - отлично! Не умеете, научим, главное, ваше желание.
~Поиск партнеров и подрядчиков. Мы любим долгосрочные взаимовыгодные отношения, тут важна ваша любовь к коммуникации, переговорам.
~Постановка задач дизайнеру, копирайтеру, программисту и пр. специалистам внутри компании. Тут нужно хотя бы знать как расшифровывается “ТЗ”, мы научим грамотно его составлять.
~Исследования рынка, аналитика: конкурентов, сравнение аналогичных предложений, цен; оформления отчетов, подготовка выводов и рекомендаций. Защищенные вами предложения будут реализованы и вы станете их частью! У нас исследования - это начало чего-то нового, а не просто табличка для галочки.
~Работа над масштабными event-проектами: конференции “Неделя Байнета” (весна) и “День открытых дверей Webcom Media” (осень). Это как родить ребенка, много подготовительных хлопот, слезы радости, когда рекламные кампании начинают работать, а участники активно регистрироваться...Счастье разрывающее тебя на кусочки, когда в день мероприятия ты видишь полный зал на 600 человек, когда во время перерывов люди окружают спикеров с кучей вопросов, когда еще месяц спустя читаешь восхищенные организацией отзывы в инете. Хотите стать частью команды, которую ставят в пример не только в Беларуси, но и за бугром? А еще привнести свое, совершенно новое? Поспеши к нам! Хотим предупредить,events такого масштаба требуют полного погружения, какой то период придется работать в режиме 24/7, силен?)
~Отдел маркетинга отвечает за разработку рекламных кампаний (акции и спец.предложения) как онлайн так и оффлайн, запуск и подготовку отчетов об эффективности, конечно, нам помогают это делать ребята из других отделов, но креатив - наше все!
~Ведение наших представительств в соцсетях.
~Работа с сайтами компании: внесение правок, нового контента, перевод контента для сайтов компании на белорусский и английский языки, как раз потренируетесь, если боитесь инглиш забыть)
~Часто создаем новые лендинги для разных проектов/услуг компании. Не умеете? Не страшно, расскажем как это делается, вы будете не один: лендинги создаем вместе с нашей замечательной командой: дизайнером, верстальщиком и программистом. Будем счастливы, если привнесете новое, увлекаетесь изучением юзабилити...с радостью вас выслушаем и примем)
~Работа с системами аналитики Google Analytics и Яндекс.Метрика

В конечном итоге, хочется увидеть горящего человека, желающего хватать все новое каждой клеткой мозга, новатора, который умеет презентовать свои идеи, аргументировать свой выбор.
В свою очередь наша команда поддержит вас, поделится опытом, любя объяснит что, зачем и почему. Все, что вы видите выше в описании вакансии не работа на месяц, это то, чем мы занимаемся в течение всего года.
Пригодится в работе:
~опыт работы над проектами: event, выставки, рекламные кампании, создание сайта для компании и тп.
~знание английского на уровне грамотного перевода копирайта для сайтов компании
~графические редакторы: CorelDRAW, Adobe Illustrator, Adobe Photoshop.
~желание писать: тексты для новостей, релизы, тексты для лендингов, объявления для рекламных кампаний и пр.
~поверхностное знакомство с соц. сетями.
~опыт работы в любой админке (без отвращения и неприязни)

​​​​Ты уже имеешь шансы на успех, если ты:
~закончил университет по специальности маркетинг
~имеешь опыт работы от года по профессии
~хочешь быть звездой, а не очередным маркетологом
~любишь принимать самостоятельные решения и нести за них ответственность
~быстро соображаешь в тупиковых ситуациях
~работаешь на 4 передаче (стиль улитки нам не подходит)

Условия:
~Официальное трудоустройство (разве можно по-другому?)

~5-дневная рабочая неделя с 09:00 до 18:00 (в период проведения мероприятий отдел маркетинга вкл режим нон-стоп)
~Команда со своей атмосферой (не веришь, ищи нас в соц.сетях)
~Приятные плюшки, которые есть в любой крупной компании (это ведь не главное!)
