5616519985885618761.text:
Работник склада (разнорабочий) – помощник на производстве мебели. Польша

телефон: +375295786235
 Работник склада (разнорабочий) – помощник на производстве мебели. 
 Работа в Республике Польша. 
 Требуется работник склада – помощник на производстве мебели. 
 Требования: 
- Желание работать, мотивация, целеустремленность 
- Тщательность, старательность. 
- Технический склад ума. 
 Обязанности: 
 Вспомогательные работы на складе, такие как: 
- Сортировка поврежденных коробок; 
- Доставка переупакованных коробок в соответствующие места хранения; 
- Доставка грузов для погрузки. 
 Перемещение груза: 
- Вывоз поддонов из производственной линии в соответствующие места хранения; 
- Перемещение товаров внутри завода в соответствии с потребностями производственных подразделений; 
- Разгрузка поддонов; 
- Комплектация коробок с заказами. 
 Разгрузка и погрузка: 
-Погрузка грузов, поступающих из склада готовой продукции, перемещение грузов между складами; 
- Разгрузка поддонов с упаковками; 
- Выгрузка импортных товаров; 
- Прием поддонов с товарами из производственных цехов. 
 Контроль: 
- Проверка подготовленных для транспортировки товаров; 
- Проверка товаров на стеллажах, сравнение состояний системы с физическими состояниями. 
 Условия: 
 Жилье: обеспечивается Работодателем бесплатно. 
 Проезд и питание: за свой счёт. 
 Оплата труда – почасовая. 
 Заработная плата высокая. 
 Лицензия на право осуществления деятельности, связанной с трудоустройством за пределами Республики Беларусь № 02010/1733 от 12 февраля 2016 года, выдана МВД РБ ЧУП «Первое решение», УНП 190890990. 
 тел. +375 29 954 80 16 (VEL), +375 17 226 11 77 (гор), +375 29 5786235 (МТС), Елена Ивановна

3282005341542183769.title: Внести изменения в категорию товаров opencart 2.0.3.1 (удаленно)
3282005341542183769.title_normalized: внест изменен в категор товар opencart удален
3282005341542183769.text:
Добрый день!

Сайт  В карточке товара отображаются отзывы с Яндекс.Маркета. Отзывы выводятся через виджет со стороннего ресурса ( Все прекрасно работает: отзывы отображаются, рейтинг товара в виде количества звезд тоже отображается. Хотелось бы продублировать эту информацию в категории товаров, а именно:

1. Необходимо в мини-карточке в категории добавить рейтинг товара. Рейтинг должен быть выведен в виде количества звезд (пример:  Звезд всегда 5. Количество закрашенных обозначает рейтинг товара. Рейтинг должен выводиться только у неакционных товаров. То же самое сделать на странице Производителя. Все однотипно, что в категории, что в производителе.
Сами звезды нужно выводить не картинкой, а текстом (fa-star). Цвет звезд: серый и зеленый (в цвет шапки).

2. Также необходимо вывести в мини-карточку количество отзывов, вместе с иконкой (18*18). Иконку дам.

На сайте  по идее есть все коды, документация, но у меня вывести это не получилось.

Необходимо, чтобы вывод всех этих рейтингов не нагружало сайт и ухудшало его скорость, т.е. необходимо какое-то несложное решение.
Понятно, что рейтинги и количество отзывов может меняться на Я.Маркете, поэтому необходимо, чтобы на сайте информация всегда была актуальной.

С Вас цена и сроки. Чем раньше, тем лучше. Убедительная просьба отвечать тем, у кого за плечами большой опыт с Opencart 2.

-1355737558623684982.title: Менеджер по туризму
-1355737558623684982.text:
Что нужно будет делать:
1. Отвечать на звонки и консультировать потенциальных клиентов 
2. Работа с заявками на туры и обзвон клиентской базы
3. Работа с клиентами в офисе
4. Ведение групп в соц.сетях
5. Изучение стран, отельной базы, саморазвитие. Среднее от 1 Если, Вы обладаете необходимыми для работы качествами:
• доброжелательное отношение к людям
• аккуратность, порядочность и ответственность
• высокая работоспособность
• стрессоустойчивость
• быстрая обучаемость
• желание развиваться
А так же приветствуется:
• приятная и грамотная речь.
• личный опыт путешествий
• наличие идей и нестандартный подход к работе
• собственная клиентская база
Возраст от 25
Для рассмотрения вашей кандидатуры присылайте ваше резюме на почту Требуется менеджер по туризму, на постоянную работу, в туристическую компанию "Евролайн Тур". Оклад+премия. Соц.пакет. Если Вам интересна тема путешествий и туризма и у Вас есть желание и амбиции зарабатывать, присылайте резюме прямо сейчас!

Customer Service Agent with Scandinavian Languages

-4458313439111375186.title: Junior Finance Specialist with English (Late shift)
-4458313439111375186.title_normalized: junior financ specialist english lat shift
-4458313439111375186.text:
Junior Finance Specialist with English (Late shift)
Place of work: Katowice, Krakow
About us
Capgemini is one of the world's foremost providers of consulting, technology and outsourcing services.
Capgemini Business Services department is one of the first and the biggest outsourcing centers in Poland providing services in 30 different languages in the areas of: finance, accounting, banking, procurement, customer care and marketing services. Business Services employs over 3800 specialists in its offices located in Krakow and Katowice.

Key responsibilities
~Managing portfolio of Customers
~Preparing and sending payment reminders to Customers
~Interacting with Client's various parties via phone and email
~Processing electronic payments
~Analyzing balances, payment plans and queries


Ideal candidate profile
~At least upper intermediate of English (min. B2)
~Focus on details
~Good communication skills
~Multitasking and ability to meet deadlines
~Working knowledge of MS Office tools (especially Excel)
~Readiness to work in late shift hours (monthly work schedule: 70% late shifts, 30% morning shifts)


What we offer
~Late shift bonus
~Taxi transport home after 22:30 PM 
~Stability  of working in a large, multinational company


Additional
~Work in multinational company for c.a. 100 Blue Chip Clients- known, global brands, supported by 6000  professionals in 30 languages.
~Clearly defined career path  (experts or managers), wide range of trainings - over 20 000 online trainings and books also available at home, trainings in classroom, funding for learning foreign languages.
~You will learn best practices and global business from Capgemini experts. Over 900 certificated professionals in the field of PMP, SAP, ACCA, etc.
~You will work in an inspiring atmosphere. We work together and celebrate together- Capgemini Theatre, employee volunteer program, integration events, sports events (basketball, volleyball) - everyone will find something for themselves!
~In addition to the salary you will receive attractive benefit package  (medical care for whole family, life insurance), flexible forms of employment  (FLEXI Program). You can recommend friends in Referral Program  and collect awards!
~Our offices are conveniently located with “Bicycle-friendly” certificate!
~As a disabled person you will get professional support. We are open to provide assistive technologies for people with diverse disabilities. We care about inclusion and equal rights approach. We conduct disability awareness trainings. Join our Win with Capgemini Program for people with disabilities.


Interested candidates are invited to apply online.
Please be advised that Capgemini Poland Sp. z o.o. located in Warsaw, Al. Jerozolimskie 96, is the controller of personal data provided by you in the recruitment applications. Your personal data will be processed in accordance with the Personal Data Protection Act of 29 August 1997 (Journal of Laws2002, No. 101, item. 926 with further amendments) for the purpose of existing and future recruitment processes. Please be advised that in scope of recruitment process your personal data will be processed by the controller and sub-processors located outside European Economic Area including India’s entity. Data submission is voluntary. Every person has the right to access their data in order to correct it or delete it”
Please include following statement in your application: "I hereby authorize Capgemini Poland Sp. z o.o. to process my personal data included in my job application for existing and future recruitment processes (in accordance with the Personal Data Protection August 1997, Journal of Laws 2002, No. 101, item. 926 with further amendments).I also authorize Capgemini Poland Sp z o.o. to sub-process my personal data outside European Economic Area including India’s entity, which may also include Capgemini’s clients within and outside of EEA."
We protect your privacy. We kindly inform you that we contact only chosen candidates.The recruitment process is conducted in accordance with the principles of equal treatment in employment, Labor Code, Chapter IIa, Art. 183a– 183e.

9098781798963589148.title: Processing Specialist
9098781798963589148.text:
Citi Service Center (CSC) is an initiative to establish a network of service centers providing high quality services to other entities operating within the Citi Group.
Citi Service Center Poland was founded in 2005, and it currently employs over 3000 highly qualified staff in three locations: Warsaw, Olsztyn and Lodz. CSC cooperates with other Citi entities from all over the world.
Currently we provide services to over 60 countries in Europe, Asia, Africa, both Americas and Australia. Our employees use over 24 languages every day. Working in our organization involves working on international projects, in an international and dynamic environment as well as learning the top quality organizational culture.   Candidates interested in this job position are asked to apply by the Citi Careers Apply button below
  Read more about career opportunities at: careeratciti.pl or facebook.com/citigradsemea 

Citi Service Center Poland


 Processing Specialist

Work place: Warszawa
16083005
Description

Asset Servicing is a "core" ongoing service provided by Citi as a custodian. This service includes collecting dividends and payments, processing corporate actions and proxy instructions.
The candidate will be responsible for the creation and  processing of all Proxy events within their designated section and will work closely with other Team Members and the Team Leader/ Section Manager of the group to address operational issues and work on other Strategic Initiatives.
Responsible for ensuring that day to day processing requirements are complete and controls are adhered to.
Other responsibilities include event capture, pre/post reconciliaition of deadlines, Client enquiries and Client Instruction handling. Preparation of reports, interfacing with the different teams and the various locations to ensure timely and accurate processing of all activities on a daily basis within the given timelines.
The candidate will be self motivated with a continuous focus on accurate data input, be able to propose changes and work well with the team.
Qualifications

~Basic knowledge of financial instruments.
~Strong organisational skills.
~Fluent English - written and spoken.
~Ability to multi-task.
~Ability to work with tight deadlines and organize own workflow.
~Communication skills.
~Process high volumes of work with excellent accuracy and attention to detail.
~Work well under pressure and meet strict deadlines.
~Strong numerical skills.


Please be informed that we will contact selected candidates only.
You are kindly requested to include the following clause in your application: “I hereby give my consent to the processing of my personal data included in my job application for the purpose of the recruitment process and after its completion for the purpose of future recruitments (pursuant to the Personal Data Protection Act as of 29 August 1997, Journal of Laws No. 133, item 883).

3960592690072752258.title: Italian Fund Accountant, Associate 1
3960592690072752258.text:
State Street Corporation: Across the globe, institutional investors rely on us to help them manage risk, respond to challenges, and drive performance and profitability. We keep our clients at the heart of everything we do, and smart, engaged employees are essential to our continued success.
Our promise to maintain an environment where every employee feels valued and able to meet their full potential infuses our company values. It’s also part of our commitment to inclusion, development and engagement, and corporate social responsibility. You’ll have tools to help balance your professional and personal life, paid volunteer days, and access to employee networks that help you stay connected to what matters to you. Join us.
At the moment we are looking for candidates for the position of
 Italian Fund Accountant, Associate 1  Job ID:   149646
Location: Gdansk

to join the insource organization supporting the State Street EMEA
Why State Street Bank Poland?
Operating in Europe since 1970 State Street services clients in multiple locations. State Street Bank Poland was first established in 2007 in Kraków. Today State Street Bank Poland employs over 2500 staff members at three sites across the city and will now open a new office in Gdańsk. This will offer multiple opportunities to gain experience in diverse areas of the investment fund cycle as our Poland branch provides investment fund accounting and related services to clients of multiple State Street locations and business units across Europe. We offer positions in a challenging, rapidly changing and international environment. State Street offers a significant scope for personal growth and career progression. Throughout your career at State Street you will be provided with a wide range of training opportunities and internal mobility options as well as individual development plans, attractive benefits (including Employee Savings Plan) and an excellent remuneration package. The continuous development of our employees from day one is critical as we continually seek to develop and expand the local management team and create future leaders from within.
Job Description:
Purpose of Role:             
The Fund Accountant is responsible for calculating the net asset values of funds by processing daily accounting related functions to ensure funds prices are accurate and delivered to the client in a timely fashion. The Fund Accountant is the central point of contact for all accounting support functions and analyzes the information received; making sure any discrepancy is monitored and resolved professionally.
Specific Duties:
TECHNICAL COMPETENCIES
CALCULATION OF FUND NET ASSET VALUE
Complete Net Asset Value calculation ensuring accuracy and timeliness.
Complete and prove reasonability of the Fund valuation components.
RECONCILIATION – ACCOUNTING RELATED
~Compares and confirms account balances per trial balance to account balances per subsidiary ledgers, Research any discrepancies.
~Complete fund accountant checklist when required in accordance with procedures.
~Ensure agreed timelines are adhered to.

OTHER
~Maybe required to undertake to review fund evaluation components.
~ Involvement in departmental ad-hoc projects.
~ Involvement in the training and development of other team members as necessary.
~ Make recommendations for changes to processes and procedures and prepare documentation for review as required.

NON - TECHNICAL COMPETENCIES
COMMUNICATION
~Resolve review points highlighted by senior fund accountants and team supervisor and ensure they are kept informed of progress.
~Establish and maintain good working relationships with internal clients and colleagues.

ORGANISATION
~Undertake appropriate housekeeping duties e.g. filing, archiving, operation of clean desk policy.

TRAINING AND PERSONAL DEVELOPMENT
~Work with Senior Fund Accountant / Team supervisor to identify objectives at the start of each year and keep them up to date.
~Actively participate in the appraisal process by completing a self-evaluation and suggesting appropriate development.
~Take responsibility for personal development and training.

Qualifications:
PERSON SPECIFICATION
Specific Qualifications / Skills:
~Numeracy / Literacy skills.
~Accuracy and ability to work to tight deadlines.
~PC literate and competent in use of spreadsheets and word processing.
~Basic understanding of fund administration would be useful but not essential.
~Good command of English.

 Critical Behaviors for Success as defined
~Takes Ownership and Initiative
~Ensures accuracy and quality
~Provides outstanding service
~Communicates Effectively
~Displays Insight & Influence
~Fosters Collaboration and Teamwork

Level Of Education:
University Students or Graduates
 Previous Level Of Experience:
Previous experience in fund administration preferred but not essential.
To apply to this position, follow the "apply now" link. To locate this position in our application page, please use the KEYWORD search functionality and insert either the State Street Job ID or the Location.
As a first step we ask all candidates to fill out our online application form. Please enclose the CV in English and remember to save this document without any Polish characteristics also in file name.
To apply for the position please visit our website 
Job ID: 149646  /   Location:   Gdańsk


State Street Bank Polska

-2640080250056562435.title: Credit and Collections Analyst with French
-2640080250056562435.text:
Credit and Collections Analyst with French
Place of work: Krakow
About us
Capgemini is one of the world's foremost providers of consulting, technology and outsourcing services.
Capgemini Business Services department is one of the first and the biggest outsourcing centers in Poland providing services in 30 different languages in the areas of: finance, accounting, banking, procurement, customer care and marketing services. Business Services employs over 3800 specialists in its offices located in Krakow and Katowice.

Key responsibilities
~Managing portfolio of French-speaking Customers
~Achieving cash collection targets
~Maintaining a professional relation with the Clients
~Maximizing the amount of closed requests in the area of cash collection
~Performing account reconciliations and preparing reports
~Coordinating the financial documents flow


Ideal candidate profile
~At least intermediate level of English (min. B1)
~At least upper intermediate of French(min. B2)
~Focus on details
~Client-focused attitude
~Multitasking and ability to meet deadlines
~Working knowledge of MS Office tools (especially Excel)


What we offer
~Work in multinational company for c.a. 100 Blue Chip Clients  - known, global brands, supported by 6000  professionals in 30 languages.
~Clearly defined career path  (experts or managers), wide range of trainings - over 20 000 online trainings and books also available at home, trainings in classroom, funding for learning foreign languages.
~You will learn best practices and global business from Capgemini experts. Over 900 certificated professionals in the field of PMP, SAP, ACCA, etc.
~You will work in an inspiring atmosphere. We work together and celebrate together- Capgemini Theatre, employee volunteer program, integration events, sports events (basketball, volleyball) - everyone will find something for themselves!
~In addition to the salary you will receive attractive benefit package  (medical care for whole family, life insurance). You can recommend friends in Referral Program  and collect awards!
~Our offices are conveniently located with “Bicycle-friendly” certificate!
~As a disabled person you will get professional support. We are open to provide assistive technologies for people with diverse disabilities. We care about inclusion and equal rights approach. We conduct disability awareness trainings. Join our Win with Capgemini Program for people with disabilities.


Interested candidates are invited to apply online.
Please be advised that Capgemini Poland Sp. z o.o. located in Warsaw, Al. Jerozolimskie 96, is the controller of personal data provided by you in the recruitment applications. Your personal data will be processed in accordance with the Personal Data Protection Act of 29 August 1997 (Journal of Laws2002, No. 101, item. 926 with further amendments) for the purpose of existing and future recruitment processes. Please be advised that in scope of recruitment process your personal data will be processed by the controller and sub-processors located outside European Economic Area including India’s entity. Data submission is voluntary. Every person has the right to access their data in order to correct it or delete it”
 Please include following statement in your application: "I hereby authorize Capgemini Poland Sp. z o.o. to process my personal data included in my job application for existing and future recruitment processes (in accordance with the Personal Data Protection August 1997, Journal of Laws 2002, No. 101, item. 926 with further amendments).I also authorize Capgemini Poland Sp z o.o. to sub-process my personal data outside European Economic Area including India’s entity, which may also include Capgemini’s clients within and outside of EEA."
 We protect your privacy. We kindly inform you that we contact only chosen candidates.The recruitment process is conducted in accordance with the principles of equal treatment in employment, Labor Code, Chapter IIa, Art. 183a– 183e.

1814350708804715599.title: PHP FullStack developer
1814350708804715599.text:
Математическая онлайн-школа "Альфа" обучает детей на всём русскоязычном пространстве. С 2010 года более 5500 учеников прошли у нас обучение.
Школа помогает детям подтянуть успеваемость по математике, сдать выпускные экзамены, а также выиграть международные олимпиады.
Задача:
~*Разработка системы обучения (первую версию мы создали сами, проверили рынок. Теперь нужен профессионал для полноценной разработки системы обучения и сайта)

Требования:
~Опыт разработки
~Навыки командной работы
~Также мы будем рады творческим, искренне любящим свою профессию!

Условия :
~Работа над собственным инновационном проектом.
~Для специалистов, постоянно показывающих высокие результаты, предусмотрена опционная программа;
~Работа на самом острие новых технологий в образовании в динамично развивающейся компании
~Быстрый профессиональный и карьерный рост
~Достойная оплата труда
~Работа в современном офисе
~Гибкий график работы
~По результатам опроса сотрудников в 2013 году мы в тройку лучших ИТ компаний

Наша миссия сделать математику доступной и понятной.
Мы глубоко обеспокоены тем, что 80% детей в школе не справляются с математикой.
И в то же самое время мы преисполнены энтузиазма, потому что знаем, как решить эту проблему!
1814350708804715599.text_normalized: математическ альф обуча дет на всем русскоязычн пространств с год бол ученик прошл у нас обучен школ помога дет подтянут успеваем по математик сдат выпускн экзам а такж выигра международн олимпиад задач систем обучен перв верс мы созда сам провер рынок тепер нуж профессиона для полноцен разработк систем обучен и сайт требован разработк командн работ мы буд рад творческ искрен любя сво професс услов над собствен инновацион проект специалист постоя показыва высок результат предусмотр опцион программ на сам остр нов технолог в образован в динамичн развива компан профессиональн и карьерн рост оплат труд в современ офис график работ результат опрос сотрудник в год мы в тройк лучш ит компан наш мисс сдела математик доступн и понятн мы глубок обеспоко тем что дет в школ не справля с математик и в то же сам врем мы преисполн энтузиазм пот что зна как реш эт пробл

7368257201168413316.title: Xamarin Developer
7368257201168413316.text:
Xamarin Developer
Location: Gdańsk

Kamil from Lublin
Tasks
Sii is looking for talented and open for new technologies developers to join our team which is responsible for mobile applications development. Team is located in our Gdańsk Office premises. You can see our office here 
~Development of complex cross-platform mobile solutions for the big players
~Building new features and bug fixing
~Cooperation within Scrum Team
~Code quality assurance with unit and integration tests


Required profile
Background/skills:
~2+ years of experience with C#/.NET 
~Practical knowledge of mobile applications development 
~Experience with developing cross-platform applications
(Xamarin) will be an asset
~Preferable experience with XAML, AXML and/or XIB
~Experience with native Android and/or iOS development is a plus
~Experience with MVVM and REST
~Experience with Git
~Experience working with agile methods (Scrum/Kanban)
~Good English skills

Personal qualities:
~Ability to work effectively in a team with different competences
~Helpful and willing to share knowledge
~Express opinions and thoughts
~Deliver efficient and solid code/solutions
~Self driven and solution oriented


We offer
~Work in Scrum framework for development with standups, plannings and retrospectives
~Project team located in Gdańsk – Olivia Business Centre ()
~Opportunity for professional development
~Attractive salary adequate to the skills and experience
~Stable employment
~Attractive social package
~Excellent work atmosphere
~Stable employment in the best IT workplace in Poland!


Interested individuals are encouraged to send their resume with reference number to :
rekrutacja-gdansk@pl.sii.eu
together with an approval for the processing of personal data listed below:
„I hereby agree for the processing of my personal data by Sii Sp. z o. o, Al. Niepodległości 69, 02-626 Warszawa, enclosed in the application documents submitted by me, including their processing in the future - for the purpose of the recruitment process. This consent is submitted voluntarily and I declare that I have been informed of the powers I am entitled to in accordance with the Protection of Personal Data Act from August 29, 1997 (consolidated version: Journal of Laws from 2002, No. 101., item 926. with amendments".
Please note that we will contact only selected candidates.

-6950875241352337324.title: Dutch Customer Service Representative
-6950875241352337324.text:
Dutch Customer Service Representative
Location: Warszawa
Are you passionate about delivering world-class customer service?

Do you want to be ambassador for a globally recognized high quality brand?

Global shoe- and accessories brand Ecco is establishing a new customer service center in Warsaw to assist its European online customers. Ecco has high ambitions for future growth within e-commerce, and we need your help. We are looking to recruit experienced customer service representatives with great communication skills, who have a positive mindset and are/ will be passionate about Ecco’s products.

You will represent ECCO to the outside world, and must build the company’s image together with your team, by providing unique customer experiences.

Duties include:
~Assisting customers with their inquiries regarding Ecco products, orders, payments, returns, claims and shipment
~Educating and updating yourself with deep knowledge about the company and products
~Taking part in training in customer service processes and best practices


Skills and Experience:
~Good interpersonal skills and ability to work as a team
~Excellent communication skills both written and spoken
~Strong customer driven focus
~Experience with customer service (phone, email, chat etc.) is an advantage

Experience in using ERP and CRM – within Microsoft AX and Dynamics CRM is an advantage
Language requirements:
~English, at least fluent is required
~Native or at least fluent: Dutch
~Polish will be advantage


We offer:
~The chance to grow your career in an international company with a globally recognized brand
~A motivated environment created by passionate colleagues and owners
~Attractive offices in Warsaw
~Salary package: Competitive, based on capabilities

Start time: As soon as possible
Contract: Full or part time


Please send your application via "Aplikuj" button:

 IN THE TITLE PLEASE ADD THE NAME OF THE POSITION YOU ARE APPLYING FOR
We will reply only to selected candidates

-1048179407732717291.title: CEMA Print Margin Finance Analyst
-1048179407732717291.text:
CEMA Print Margin Finance Analyst
Location: Wroclaw
Description 
The EMEA Print organization is deploying a new business operating model where country will shift their focus from revenue and contra, to revenue and margin.
The project has started in June FY’16 and we are now recruiting finance analyst who will closely work with the country finance and category teams to understand their actual margin, and build the quarterly forecasts.
Print margin has multiple views as it sums Hardware margin as well as Supplies margin, looks at current system margin, but also projects the future margin from actual installed base.
These are job creations, where the new analysts will play a key role in building their processes and tools.
The analysts will closely work with the EMEA Finance team, and leverage from the existing tools and processes around country reporting (Essbase tool), SKU level actual results (EDW & excel) forecasting tool (FPS), secured reporting (EDW working margin).
Required competencies:
~P&L understanding, revenue and COS
~An experience in FP&A or contra revenue team is a plus
~Knowledge of revenue and contra revenue processes is a plus

~Knowledge of BW, EDW systems are a plus 


Behaviors:
~Ability to work in changing and open environment,
~Eagerness to build new tools and processes
~Ability to work remotely with category and finance people from multiple countries
~Curiosity
~Engagement

We are offering

~Working in an international company
~Opportunity to develop career path in organizational structures
~Flexible time schedule
~Modern and friendly work environment with open door policy
~Professional trainings
~Social benefits
~Competitive salary and flexible working hours
~Private medical care
~Benefit sport system
~Life insurance
~Extend Wellness Program


Make it happen today! Apply at hp.com/jobs

Make sure you insert the following statement along with your CV:
I hereby authorize you to process my personal data included in my
job application for the needs of the recruitment process (in accordance
with the Personnel Protection Act of 29.08.1997 no 133 position 883).

1891773021839291414.title: Senior Automation Tester
1891773021839291414.text:
Senior Automation Tester
Location: Wrocław

Kamil from Lublin
Tasks
~Creating, deploying and improving Quality Assurance processes throughout the project lifecycle
~Developing scripts, utilities, simulators, data sets and other programmatic test tools as required to execute test plans
~Designing documents and specifications from testing perspective
~Collaborating with Business Analysts and Developers


Required profile
~Minimum 4 years of experience in designing and developing a test automation framework for a .NET or similar application 
~Experience with developing test automation in an agile methodology    
~Experience in operational know-how of Test Processes, including test preparation/execution planning, test case creation/execution and reporting 
~Very good English skills
~Analytical and problem solving skills

Nice to have:

~Experience with GUI and DWH automation
~Knowledge of scripting (e.g. VBScript, Python) and/or Object-Orientated programming languages (e.g. C#, VB.net) 
~Knowledge of MS SQL or Oracle
~Practical experience in Continuous Integration 
~Experience of using JIRA or Quality Centre (or equivalent tools)
~Testing qualification such as ISTQB, ISEB etc.


We offer
~Interesting cooperation with specialists from various fields (web, embedded, mobile)
~A wide variety of training packages: technical trainings, soft skills courses, English/Polish classes
~Access to our technical library, e-learning portals and „knowledge sharing” meetings
~Multilingual, Multicultural creative work environment
~Possibility to design your own career path
~Possibility to develop by switching between preferred projects, technologies and sectors
~Clear and concise feedback system
~An opportunity to work in the company where your opinions are important and taken into account
~Private health care, multisport package and group insurance
~Lots of memorable integration parties for you and your family
~Relocation packages available for those who decide to move and work with us in Wrocław
~Stable employment In the Best place to work in IT In Poland!

Please send your resume with reference number or information about the website you took the advert from


Interested individuals are encouraged to send their resume with reference number to :
rekrutacja-wroclaw@pl.sii.eu
together with an approval for the processing of personal data listed below:

Niepodległości 69, 02-626 Warszawa, enclosed in the application documents submitted by me, including their processing in the future - for the purpose of the recruitment process. This consent is submitted voluntarily and I declare that I have been informed of the powers I am entitled to in accordance with the Protection of Personal Data Act from August 29, 1997 (consolidated version: Journal of Laws from 2002, No. 101., item 926. with amendments".
Please note that we will contact only selected candidates.

7287711952714035220.title: Швея
7287711952714035220.text:
Компания «МИЛАВИЦА», один из крупнейших производителей корсетных изделий в Восточной Европе, в связи с развитием производства создаёт новые рабочие места и приглашает ШВЕЙ на работу в г.Минск.

Обязанности:
~пошив женского белья, корсетных, трикотажных изделий и купальников.

Наши требования:
~желателен опыт работы с трикотажем,
~знание швейного оборудования,
~хорошее зрение,
~развитая мелкая моторика рук, подвижность пальцев, умение работать с мелкими деталями (увлечение шитьём, вышиванием, вязанием, лепкой, мозаикой или другими видами рукоделия)
~готовность к высокой интенсивности труда, освоению нового ассортимента и оборудования.

Условия:
~комфортные и современно оборудованные рабочие места,
~оплата сдельно-премиальная (средняя зарплата швей более 600 рублей),
~при отсутствии профессии предлагаем обучение 3 мес. с выплатой ученических 240 руб. + оплата за сделанную работу,
~для новых швей устанавливаем доплаты за освоение ассортимента в течение первого года работы,
~иногородним предоставляем общежитие,
~предоставляем социальные льготы и гарантии в соответствии с коллективным договором (материальная помощь к отпуску, на строительство жилья, к юбилейным и другим личным датам, путевки на оздоровление детей, детские новогодние подарки, бесплатные занятия по фитнесу, корпоративные мероприятия и др.)
~график работы сменный по неделям (6.45-15.05, 15.10-23.30), сб., вс. – выходные.
~приглашаем посмотреть условия работы по адресу ул.Нововиленская, г.Минск.

Ждем умелых мастериц/мастеров, мечтающих приобщиться к созданию прекрасного белья для современных женщин!

2342399874082310561.title: Infrastructure Analyst (German language)
2342399874082310561.text:
Infrastructure Analyst (German language)
Place of work: Katowice
About us
Capgemini is one of the world's foremost providers of consulting, technology and outsourcing services.
Cloud Infrastructure Services is one of the biggest outsourcing service providers in Poland. Since the establishment of our first service center in Krakow in 2004, it has achieved great success and grown rapidly. In 2006, we opened a second center in Katowice and in 2012 a third center in Opole. Today, our team of 2,000 professionals delivers IT outsourcing services to 40 clients in 20 languages.

Position purpose
We are currently looking for a candidate to work within a team which is responsible end to end for supporting IT infrastructure for one of the largest network of stores in Europe.
The analyst will provide the technical support to the critical IT events occurred in the stores and ensure that any major outage in the store is driven smoothly to the resolution

Main accountabilities
~Carrying out tasks by strictly following the documents containing the procedures and work instructions
~Incident dispatching, escalation and progress monitoring 
~Managing calls through to resolution according to established procedures


Requirements
~General IT knowledge and understanding the IT principles (hardware configuration, databases, networking - DHCP)
~Knowledge of Windows operating system (experience in Windows Servers Environment is an asset)
~Understanding VMWare infrastructure
~Team player with great attention to detail
~Ability to manage and collaborate with other teams

 Foreign Languages:
~Fluent German 
~Communicative English


What we offer
You will work in multinational, stable company for c.a. 100 Blue Chip Clients - known, global brands, supported by 6000  professionals in 30 languages
You will gain space to fulfill your ambitions and develop your career, opportunity to take part in transition projects. We operate according to Lean and Kaizen philosophy.
You will choose your career path (experts or managers) – you will work among professionals (over 900). We will support you to gain knowledge (20 000 online trainings and in class) and get certified (e.g. ITIL, Vmware, Citrix, Oracle Database). You will have the opportunity to take part in coaching programs and develop your knowledge in experts communities.
You will work in line with high, international work standards and you will have an opportunity to engage in CSR initiatives.
You will be appreciated for your results and professionalism – based on clear rules of promotion. Our company applies a wide choice of perks (free private medical care for you and your family, additional life insurance). We help to keep right proportions between your work and private life (Business Parent Program)

Interested candidates are invited to apply online.
Please be advised that Capgemini Poland Sp. z o.o. located in Warsaw, Al. Jerozolimskie 96, is the controller of personal data provided by you in the recruitment applications. Your personal data will be processed in accordance with the Personal Data Protection Act of 29 August 1997 (Journal of Laws2002, No. 101, item. 926 with further amendments) for the purpose of existing and future recruitment processes. Please be advised that in scope of recruitment process your personal data will be processed by the controller and sub-processors located outside European Economic Area including India’s entity. Data submission is voluntary. Every person has the right to access their data in order to correct it or delete it”
 Please include following statement in your application: "I hereby authorize Capgemini Poland Sp. z o.o. to process my personal data included in my job application for existing and future recruitment processes (in accordance with the Personal Data Protection August 1997, Journal of Laws 2002, No. 101, item. 926 with further amendments).I also authorize Capgemini Poland Sp z o.o. to sub-process my personal data outside European Economic Area including India’s entity, which may also include Capgemini’s clients within and outside of EEA."
 We protect your privacy. We kindly inform you that we contact only chosen candidates.The recruitment process is conducted in accordance with the principles of equal treatment in employment, Labor Code, Chapter IIa, Art. 183a– 183e.

-7169216905944434050.title: Разнорабочие на деревообрабатывающее производство работа в Республике Польша
-7169216905944434050.title_normalized: разнорабоч на деревообрабатыва производств работ в республик польш
-7169216905944434050.text:
Разнорабочие на деревообрабатывающее производство работа в Республике Польша

телефон: +375295786235
 Разнорабочие 
 на деревообрабатывающее производство 
 работа в Республике Польша 
 Обязанности: 
 Работа в разных цехах и на складе. За работником закреплено постоянное на одном рабочее место. Каждый цех - отдельная автоматизированная производственная линия. 
 Работа на деревообрабатывающих станках разного размера. 
 Оператор вкладывает бревно в станок, а потом работники вынимают доски и укладывают их на поддоны. 
 Машины распиливают доски до определенного размера, а задачей оператора является следить за точностью распила. 
 Женщины работают с досками небольшого размера и веса либо в цеху по очистке древесины от сучков. Мужчины работают с более тяжелыми досками. 
 Жилье: обеспечивается Работодателем. Очень хорошие условия проживания. Жильё находится недалеко от места работы. 
 Заработная плата высокая. 
 Лицензия на право осуществления деятельности, связанной с трудоустройством за пределами Республики Беларусь № 02010/1733 от 12 февраля 2016 года, выдана МВД РБ ЧУП «Первое решение», УНП 190890990, 
 тел. +375 29 954 80 16 (VEL), +375 17 226 11 77 (гор), +375 29 5786235 (МТС), Елена Ивановна

-7130954433697926161.title: Junior Recruitment Specialist
-7130954433697926161.text:
Junior Recruitment Specialist
Place of work: Katowice, Krakow
About us
Capgemini is one of the world's foremost providers of consulting, technology and outsourcing services.
Capgemini Business Services department is one of the first and the biggest outsourcing centers in Poland providing services in 30 different languages in the areas of: finance, accounting, banking, procurement, customer care and marketing services. Business Services employs over 3800 specialists in its offices located in Krakow and Katowice.

Position purpose
The Junior Recruitment Specialist will be responsible for timely and accurate delivery of the recruitment service according to the project deadlines and to the expected quality. The person will also interact with Candidates and the Client on a daily basis via phone and email, as well as work on resolving recruitment related requests and cooperate with other delivery team members. Another key element will be ensuring that all the necessary process documentation is complete and up to date.

Main accountabilities
~Liaise with managers to identify staffing needs and candidate’s profile
~Proactively source candidates
~Carry out recruitment interviews with candidates
~Recommend candidates for specified positions according to business requirements
~Prepare and present job offers
~Database maintenance in a timely and accurate manner
~Meet defined SLAs


Candidate’s profile
~Fluent Polish and at least very good knowledge of English
~Educational background in Human Resource Management, Psychology or related
~Some experience in the recruitment field preferred
~Knowledge of MS Office suite, especially Excel and Outlook
~Strong motivation for development in HR/recruitment area
~Good organizational skills, attention to details
~Ability to prioritize and manage multiple tasks
~Customer focus and excellent communication skills
~“Can-do” attitude and proactive approach


What we offer
~Work in multinational company for c.a. 100 Blue Chip Clients - known, global brands, supported by 6000  professionals in 30 languages.
~Clearly defined career path (experts or managers), wide range of trainings - over 20 000 online trainings and books also available at home, trainings in classroom, funding for learning foreign languages.
~You will learn best practices and global business from Capgemini experts. Over 900 certificated professionals  in the field of PMP, SAP, ACCA, etc.
~You will work in an inspiring atmosphere. We work together and celebrate together - Capgemini Theatre, employee volunteer program, integration events, sports events (basketball, volleyball) - everyone will find something for themselves!
~In addition to the salary you will receive attractive benefit package (medical care for whole family, life insurance). You can recommend friends in Referral Program  and collect awards!
~Our offices are conveniently located with “Bicycle-friendly” certificate!
~As a disabled person you will get professional support. We are open to provide assistive technologies for people with diverse disabilities. We care about inclusion and equal rights approach. We conduct disability awareness trainings. Join our Win with Capgemini Program for people with disabilities.


Interested candidates are invited to apply online.
Please be advised that Capgemini Poland Sp. z o.o. located in Warsaw, Al. Jerozolimskie 96, is the controller of personal data provided by you in the recruitment applications. Your personal data will be processed in accordance with the Personal Data Protection Act of 29 August 1997 (Journal of Laws2002, No. 101, item. 926 with further amendments) for the purpose of existing and future recruitment processes. Please be advised that in scope of recruitment process your personal data will be processed by the controller and sub-processors located outside European Economic Area including India’s entity. Data submission is voluntary. Every person has the right to access their data in order to correct it or delete it”
 Please include following statement in your application: "I hereby authorize Capgemini Poland Sp. z o.o. to process my personal data included in my job application for existing and future recruitment processes (in accordance with the Personal Data Protection August 1997, Journal of Laws 2002, No. 101, item. 926 with further amendments).I also authorize Capgemini Poland Sp z o.o. to sub-process my personal data outside European Economic Area including India’s entity, which may also include Capgemini’s clients within and outside of EEA."
 We protect your privacy. We kindly inform you that we contact only chosen candidates.The recruitment process is conducted in accordance with the principles of equal treatment in employment, Labor Code, Chapter IIa, Art. 183a– 183e.

6132946378693654606.company_name: Philip Morris International Service Center Europe
6132946378693654606.title: International HR Tax Expert
6132946378693654606.text:
… SO APPLY AS 
INTERNATIONAL HR TAX EXPERT
Location: Kraków
Are you inquisitive and self-driven? Will you make a difference to our company and your colleagues around you? If the answer is yes, ja, oui or igen, then we’d like to hear from you.
WE ARE LOOKING TO RECRUIT:
~a candidate with solid Tax, HR background preferably from consultancy area
~a professional with understanding of taxation and social security implications associated with international assignments, compensation and benefits, tax compliance and tax equalization process
~fluent English speaker who demonstrates ability to manage multiple tasks simultaneously and is customer orientated
~a person who is process, policy, and detail oriented, in a manner that is engaging, empathetic, as well as business-smart.
~a candidate with highly developed communication (oral and written), listening, and conflict resolution skills
~a candidate demonstrating leadership in implementation of new strategies, change management, being able to address employee mobility requirements and experienced in partnering with all levels of employees within the organization, in a multi-cultural and global environment.

RISE TO THE CHALLENGE
PMI Service Center Europe Sp. z o.o (PMI SCE) is seeking for talented people to join our team in the Finance Department, International HR Tax team in Krakow, Poland.
As an International HR Tax Expert you will be responsible for:
~managing PMI assignee’s worldwide Tax and Social Security processes effectively, at optimal cost, while ensuring equity among assignee’s (all types of assignments)
~staying abreast of the relevant tax legislation in the area of Personal Income Tax, Social Security and avoidance of double taxation and dual social security
~building a network and advising IA Team and local HRDs in four Regions on ensuring governance and consistent application of the PMI guidelines in the area of tax and social security
~working closely with the IA Department  in order to reduce overlaps and driving efficient execution; streamlining and simplifying processes with the view to improve and gain efficiencies will be a key priority
~preparing all relevant documents for international assignment agreements, cost projections, tax impact estimations, termination implications’ reports, various instructions using the internal/external calculation tools and cooperating with assigned external tax advisor (when appropriate)
~working on ad hoc projects

WE OFFER
~company kindergarten possibility
~private medical and dental care, life insurance
~subsidized meals in company canteens
~remote work opportunity and flexible working arrangements
~employee pension plan
~multisport program
~holiday, cultural & Christmas bonus
~wide range of trainings, optional language classes, further education and professional qualification support possibility
~free bike and car parking for all employees 

JOIN A GLOBAL MARKET LEADER
Philip Morris International Inc. (PMI) is the leading international tobacco company, with seven of the world’s top 15 brands, including the number one cigarette brand worldwide.
PMI SCE was established in late 2005 in Krakow and since then is increasingly serving PMI affiliates’ Financial Accounting, Human Resources (HR), Procurement and Information Services (IT) needs in Europe, Middle East and Africa.

Interested? Motivated? Apply on-line in English at
 by 05.01.2017
Please note that only on-line applications will be taken into consideration. Only selected candidates will be contacted.

2358992124786278269.title: HPI European and Middle East Sales Finance Retail Analyst
2358992124786278269.title_normalized: hpi europea middl east sales financ reta analyst
2358992124786278269.text:
HPI European and Middle East Sales Finance Retail Analyst
Location: Wroclaw
Description
HPI European and Middle East Sales Finance Retail Analyst
We are looking for the EMEA Sales Finance Analyst (Specialist level), reporting to the HPI EMEA (European and Middle EAst ) Sales Channel Finance Manager.
Business environment:
HPI EMEA sales Finance department support the HPI EMEA Headquarter sales from Direct to Indirect sales of HPI products and services (Printing and computing).
Roles of central EMEA sales organization are various starting from Sales Strategy to end customer’s deals including RTM (Route To Market) and sales programs design implementation and reporting.
EMEA Sales central team is divided into 3 different blocks including: Commercial Channel support  (with various activities such as Distribution, Mid Market, Proximity and resellers) , Retail Channel support (including HP store selling directly to end customers)  and Road to Market reporting supporting HP sales compensation and Partner compensation and Gross Margin reporting (Distributors and resellers Margin). 
Main responsibilities:
~Review DGF (Demand Generation Funds) accruals and financial exposure. Review data with GEM analyst and Interact with countries to discuss corner cases to ensure full compliance.
~You will work closely with the Retail Sales Finance lead to complete Sales Retail dashboard and prioritize program investment.
~You will prepare the Quota target objectives for the countries and ensure the calculation of the conversation factor to translate Revenues Objectives into Sales Net Shipments and Net Sell Out objectives.
~Support WW project requirements and data collection for BU units (computing and Printing) new business model priorities (new product introduction such as X3, lease offering…)
~Partner with HP store Sales Finance colleagues to leverage spending activities (mktg, adverstising, data analytics…)

Education and Experience Required:
~First level university degree with a focus in business or economics; advanced degree and/or accounting certification (Certified Public Accountant (CPA), Master of Business Administration (MBA)) strongly preferred.
~Typically 2+ years of experience in a finance function.
~Typically strong experience of HP financial systems and good ability to analyze complex data.
~Fluent in English is mandatory

Knowledge and Skills Required:
~Excellent business acumen. Category or country Finance experience is a plus.
~Superior understanding of accounting principles and financial analysis.
~Superior analytical skills.
~Strong collaboration skills – able to connect with various teams across both Finance and Sales to produce effective outcomes.
~Lead on financial treatment of new initiatives/programmes etc.
~Excellent communication skills, catered to a wide variety of audiences.
~Passion, Engagement, Commitment, and Self-Starter
~Excellent consulting, influence, and negotiation skills.
~Excellent multi-tasking and prioritization skills.

We are offering

~Working in an international company
~Opportunity to develop career path in organizational structures
~Flexible time schedule
~Modern and friendly work environment with open door policy
~Professional trainings
~Social benefits
~Competitive salary and flexible working hours
~Private medical care
~Benefit sport system
~Life insurance
~Extend Wellness Program


Make it happen today! Apply at hp.com/jobs

Make sure you insert the following statement along with your CV:
I hereby authorize you to process my personal data included in my
job application for the needs of the recruitment process (in accordance
with the Personnel Protection Act of 29.08.1997 no 133 position 883).

-970294154335447979.title: Talented Java Developer
-970294154335447979.text:
We are a Danish IT consultancy with over 800 employees in Denmark, Poland and Norway aiming to make societies smarter by developing complex IT solutions. We are looking for: 

SKILLED AND AMBITIOUS JAVA DEVELOPERS
for our Polish office that will help us achieve our goals and continuous growth. You will be a part of exciting projects working closely together with your Polish and Danish colleagues. 


Your qualifications:
Bachelor or Masters degree within a relevant IT specialization
~Preferably experience from the IT industry
~High level of IT technical understanding
~Strong academic results
~Quality and result oriented
~Very good English skills both in writing and verbally


What we offer:
~Exciting challenges in a dynamic and international environment
~Contract of employment (umowa o pracę)
~Mentor for each employee
~Regular feedback
~Internal and external trainings
~Medical insurance
~Multisport card
~Lunch card
~Free drinks, fruits and snacks at the office
~Team and company events
~Possibility to work and travel to Denmark
~Attractive office and great location in Warsaw (Metro Wilanowska)


Give us a call +48 785 139 369 or send CV – pl.hr@netcompany.com

8686905280518911927.title: Customer Care Representative with Dutch or Italian
8686905280518911927.text:
ACN is the largest Direct Selling Company for services in the world. ACN bypasses traditional forms of marketing by going directly to customers through independent business owners (IBO’s), providing them with the products and services they need and use every day, while also offering a powerful business ownership opportunity for entrepreneurs. Founded in 1993, ACN has offices in North America, South America, Europe, Asia and Australia servicing millions of customers in 23 countries.
ACN manages its European business from its European Headquarters in Amsterdam, Netherlands, and operational offices in Åmål, Sweden, and Wroclaw, Poland.
Working at ACN Europe means working in a dynamic and very international environment.
At present, over 300 employees with over 30 different nationalities are working in our European offices. Our professionals work in the field of Customer and Representative Operations, Finance, Product Management, IT, Marketing, Legal and HR.
To further strengthen our Wroclaw team, we are looking for:

Customer Care Representative with Dutch or Italian

Wrocław, Poland
Responsibilities:
~Being first point of contact for clients and resolving their requests by e-mail/phone/chat.
~Solving customer queries directly or escalating it to the appropriate department accordingly with the procedure.
~Recording and following up customer contacts in the computer system to build customer history.
~Attending training sessions for the purpose of learning about new procedures, products, services and keeping up to date to ensure high quality of service when dealing with customers.
~Highlighting unusual situations fast and addressing it to the management for follow-up as necessary.
~Assisting in various projects on an ad hoc basis.
~Effectively communicate with other departments regarding customer queries/escalations. 


Requirements:
~Fluent Dutch or Italian and good command of English
~Effective and efficient communication skills
~Customer service orientation
~Highly developed computer literacy
~High motivation and learning skills
~Previous experience in a customer services environment is an advantage


We offer:
~A stable full-time job (with 1 hour of fully paid break)
~Full on the job training
~Private medical care
~Cafeteria benefit system (Multisport card or other benefits to choose)
~Team events
~Internal and external trainings
~Great atmosphere and multicultural environment
~Additional days off for years of service

If you are interested in this great opportunity send your application
via button "Appy"


By clicking "Send" you are agreeing to the processing of personal data for purposes of recruitment processes in accordance with the provisions of the Act of August 29, 1997 on the protection of personal data ( ie Journal Laws of 2002, no .101 ,Laws . 926, as amended.). Data is provided voluntarily, at any time you are entitled to access, correct or delete. Request to remove information means giving up part of the recruitment process. If you do not express such consent, please, do not click this button.

29442555435116078.title: Securities Services Operations Project Manager
29442555435116078.text:
Citi Service Center (CSC) is an initiative to establish a network of service centers providing high quality services to other entities operating within the Citi Group.
Citi Service Center Poland was founded in 2005, and it currently employs over 3000 highly qualified staff in three locations: Warsaw, Olsztyn and Lodz. CSC cooperates with other Citi entities from all over the world.
Currently we provide services to over 60 countries in Europe, Asia, Africa, both Americas and Australia. Our employees use over 24 languages every day. Working in our organization involves working on international projects, in an international and dynamic environment as well as learning the top quality organizational culture.   Candidates interested in this job position are asked to apply by the Citi Careers Apply button below
  Read more about career opportunities at: careeratciti.pl or facebook.com/citigradsemea 

Citi Service Center Poland


 Securities Services Operations Project Manager

Work place: Warszawa
16081722
Description

Job Purpose:
Operations Project Manager to manage key projects as part of book of work. Helping to forge global standards governance and internal reporting with the objective to drive consistency and efficiency in the delivery of all initiatives across the Direct Custody and Clearing and Issuer Operations team.
Key Responsibilities:
• Drive multiple projects across products and processes at a global level
• Ensure appropriate governance structure of all projects including materials, budget, risks and plan tracking
• Appropriately escalate in a timely manner all risks and issues identified
• Delivering to tight deadlines across multiple geographies and functional teams
• Projects are global in nature and will require engaging stakeholders within Operations, Technology, Business, Compliance, Legal, Regional/Global Management and external clients
• This role is expected to project manage and oversee the Straight Through Process initiatives also focusing on Manual touch points, ensuring consistent application and reporting across the global teams
• Deliver Consistent and timely project related MIS on a regular basis
• Analysis of progress against strategic and financial objectives
• Work with Global Operations head and business office on ad-hoc projects or initiatives
Development Value:
• Significant exposure role, managing projects which are key to the transformation strategy for DCC and Issuer
• Significant learning potential across 63 markets, product knowledge and Senior management exposure
Qualifications

Knowledge/Experience:
• Experience in Project Management
• Experience of working in a process-driven environment with re-engineering focus
• Experience of a financial services environment with an analytical focus
• Experience of working in a controls-focused environment
• Proven experience delivering tangible results

Skills:
• Project Management
• Excellent analytical skills
• Pragmatism combined with a can-do attitude is a pre-requisite
• Excellent oral and written communication skills
• Ability to establish credibility at multiple levels
• Excellent interpersonal and communication skills
• Ability to lead though influencing
• Outstanding attention to detail and the ability to deliver to a high standard
• Execution mindset, with a focus on tangible results

Qualifications:
• Extensive years of experience in Financial Services
• Educated to degree level or higher
• Formal project qualification (e.g. PMP certification)

Competencies
• Individual contributor with the ability to work in a team of diverse skill sets and cultures
• Strong people, process and business focus
• Ability to react to a dynamic environment
• Ability to remain calm and objective in a high-pressure environment
• Must have strong drive and enthusiasm, self-management and be ready to use own initiative

Exceptional candidates who do not meet these criteria may be considered for the role provided they have the necessary skills and experience.
Valuing Diversity:
Demonstrates an appreciation of a diverse workforce. Appreciates differences in style or perspective and uses differences to add value to decisions or actions and organisational success.
Citi is an Equal Opportunities Employer


Please be informed that we will contact selected candidates only.
You are kindly requested to include the following clause in your application: “I hereby give my consent to the processing of my personal data included in my job application for the purpose of the recruitment process and after its completion for the purpose of future recruitments (pursuant to the Personal Data Protection Act as of 29 August 1997, Journal of Laws No. 133, item 883).
